K12D0834_H0798:328b-19: gos pa med pa'i ston pa'i mthar thug go //
K12D0834_H0798:328b-20: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'khor ba'i skyon dang /
K12D0834_H0798:328b-21: mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan bstan pa'i phyir
K12D0834_H0798:328b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du brjod pa
K12D0834_H0798:328b-25: snying po bla med ji snyed pa'i //
K12D0834_H0798:329a-2: mtha' dang bral bas bdag med pa'o //
K12D0834_H0798:329a-3: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
K12D0834_H0798:329a-4: ae ma ho ji srid 'jig rten 'khrul pa'i chos //
K12D0834_H0798:329a-5: ma rig rtog pa'i gzung 'dzin gyis //
K12D0834_H0798:329a-6: stong gi 'jig rten bsam yas par //
K12D0834_H0798:329a-8: rtog pa'i bag chags stug po yin //
K12D0834_H0798:329a-9: mi mthun bde sdug myong bar 'gyur //
K12D0834_H0798:329a-10: de nyid ji bzhin dbyings nyid dang //
K12D0834_H0798:329a-11: rang bzhin bdag med tshul gcig ste //
K12D0834_H0798:329a-12: rang bzhin nyid la nyams pa med //
K12D0834_H0798:329a-13: yang dag sgyu ma'i tshul gnyis su //
K12D0834_H0798:329a-14: bdag dang bdag gi gzhan med de //
K12D0834_H0798:329a-15: de nyid ngo bo nyid dbyings pas; ;rnam dag dbyings nyid tshul gcig go /
K12D0834_H0798:329a-16: bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnams ni //
K12D0834_H0798:329a-17: log par rtog pa tsam nyid las //
K12D0834_H0798:329a-18: phra zhing zab pa yod ma yin //
K12D0834_H0798:329a-19: log rtog nyid la nyid spyod de //
K12D0834_H0798:329a-20: gzhan du g-yo ba ci yang med //
K12D0834_H0798:329a-21: log rtog rgyu 'bras rgyun nyid kyang //
K12D0834_H0798:329a-22: gzhi rtsa med de skad cig ma //
K12D0834_H0798:329a-23: rnam par dag ba'i dbyings nyid tshul //
K12D0834_H0798:329a-24: nyid la dbang sgyur nyid spyod phyir //
K12D0834_H0798:329a-25: bdag dang gzhan dang rtog pa'i rgyun //
K12D0834_H0798:329a-26: rnam dag bla med theg pa'i mchog /
K12D0834_H0798:329b-0: theg pa bzhi @329b yis nges 'byung la //
K12D0834_H0798:329b-1: theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas //
K12D0834_H0798:329b-2: yang dag rtogs pas rab brtags na //
K12D0834_H0798:329b-3: rang bzhin med la cir yang 'grub //
K12D0834_H0798:329b-4: sangs rgyas mya ngan yod mi 'da'//
K12D0834_H0798:329b-5: chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te //
K12D0834_H0798:329b-6: ma rig smin mdzad gdul ba'i phyir //
K12D0834_H0798:329b-8: 'dul ba mdo sde chos mngon dang; ;dam tshig sgrub dang grub pa dang //
K12D0834_H0798:329b-9: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud //
K12D0834_H0798:329b-10: ji snyed 'jig rten mtha' klas par //
K12D0834_H0798:329b-11: phyogs bcur kun tu rab grags pa //
K12D0834_H0798:329b-12: gsang ba'i snying po las 'phros te //
K12D0834_H0798:329b-13: rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po 'di //
K12D0834_H0798:329b-14: sde snod kun dang rgyud kun tu //
K12D0834_H0798:329b-15: ston pa'i thub pa bsam yas pa //
K12D0834_H0798:329b-17: chos rnams ming du btags pa tsam //
K12D0834_H0798:329b-18: ston pas don dang mthun phyogs su //
K12D0834_H0798:329b-19: ming nying tshig tu brtags nas bstan //
K12D0834_H0798:329b-20: ston cing tshig la dngos po med //
K12D0834_H0798:329b-21: ces brjod pas chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis
K12D0834_H0798:329b-22: lhun gyis grub pa chen por gsal bar gyur to
K12D0834_H0798:329b-23: // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lhun gyis grub
K12D0834_H0798:329b-24: pa gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid
K12D0834_H0798:329b-25: kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku gsung thugs dang yon
K12D0834_H0798:329b-26: tan 'phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo //
K12D0834_H0798:330a-2: rgyud drug skye 'gag lus dang longs spyod dang //
K12D0834_H0798:330a-3: gnas dang sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor la sogs pa; ;log rtog nyid las gzhan du ci yang med //
K12D0834_H0798:330a-4: stod nyid bdag med ye mkhyen rang rig thugs //
K12D0834_H0798:330a-5: dmigs bya dmigs byed med par dran dbang sgyur //
K12D0834_H0798:330a-6: ngo mtshar sku gsung yon tan zhing khams la //
K12D0834_H0798:330a-7: gzhan na med de de nyid de ltar yin //
K12D0834_H0798:330a-8: zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o //
K12D0834_H0798:330a-9: thub pa drug gis sprul pa grangs med pa dang //
K12D0834_H0798:330a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa yang
K12D0834_H0798:330a-11: de dag tu 'dus par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid
K12D0834_H0798:330a-12: kyis mkhyen to // gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /
K12D0834_H0798:330a-13: chos thams cad gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o ////
K12D0834_H0798:330a-14: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das dgyes
K12D0834_H0798:330a-15: pa chen pos 'gro ba thams cad kyi rang bzhin
K12D0834_H0798:330a-16: gyi dkyil 'khor yod par bstan pa dang /
K12D0834_H0798:330a-17: rigs rgyud drug tu yang bshad /
K12D0834_H0798:330a-18: de la chos nyid kyi rigs ni /
K12D0834_H0798:330a-19: thams cad kun la yang yod do //
K12D0834_H0798:330a-20: nam mkha' yang kun la khyab par gnas so //
K12D0834_H0798:330a-21: de ltar chos kyi dbyings dang /
K12D0834_H0798:330b-0: nam mkhas kun la khyab kyang rnam par thar pa'i don @330b ma rtog sa na /
K12D0834_H0798:330b-1: me long g-yas g-yogs pa dang 'dra ste /
K12D0834_H0798:330b-2: gzugs brnyan snang ba'i bya ba byed mi nus so //
K12D0834_H0798:330b-3: zhes gsungs nas yang 'di skad rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs so //
K12D0834_H0798:330b-4: mnyam nyid don rtogs rang rig rgyal po dang //
K12D0834_H0798:330b-5: rgya mtsho chen por chu klung 'bab pa ltar //
K12D0834_H0798:330b-6: bla med don rtogs thabs chen 'di dag tu //
K12D0834_H0798:330b-7: rnam pa'i theg pa bsam yas ma lus 'dus //
K12D0834_H0798:330b-9: bdag med gnyis rtogs pha rol phyin rdzogs pa //
K12D0834_H0798:330b-10: sa bcu rim gyis bsgoms pa'i rnal 'byor pa //
K12D0834_H0798:330b-11: sangs rgyas sar 'gro go 'phang thob pa'i lam //
K12D0834_H0798:330b-12: bden pa gnyis kyis rab tu thob par 'gyur //
K12D0834_H0798:330b-13: phyi nang rten 'brel sgyu ma mig yor tshul shes pa'i //
K12D0834_H0798:330b-14: dngos po gzugs la thogs med rab tu 'jug /
K12D0834_H0798:330b-15: dge bshes mi slob rang gi rig pas rtogs //
K12D0834_H0798:330b-16: byang chub sar 'gro yid bzhin bde ba'i mchog /
K12D0834_H0798:330b-17: bden bzhi don rtogs rab tu spong ba yis //
K12D0834_H0798:330b-18: ye shes bcu drug cha sbyangs rab zhi ba'i //
K12D0834_H0798:330b-19: rgyun zhugs la sogs rim par sbyangs nas ni //
K12D0834_H0798:330b-20: nyon mongs dgra rnams rab tu zhi ba'i sa ru 'gro //
K12D0834_H0798:330b-21: theg pa gang du bstan pa ma nges pa'i //
K12D0834_H0798:330b-22: yang na kun la mthun nas 'jam par 'jug /
K12D0834_H0798:330b-23: yang na nges med 'di zhes brtag tu med //
K12D0834_H0798:330b-24: 'di ni ma nges rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs //
K12D0834_H0798:331a-1: spyod cing mi dge spong byed pa //
K12D0834_H0798:331a-2: 'dod khams lha dang mi ru skye ba'i rgyu //
K12D0834_H0798:331a-3: tshad med bzhi spyod mi g-yo sgom byed pa //
K12D0834_H0798:331a-4: tshangs gnas la sogs skye ba'i rgyu yin no //
K12D0834_H0798:331a-5: chos kyi dbyings kyis kun tu khyab gyur kyang //
K12D0834_H0798:331a-6: rang rig rtogs pa'i skal dang mi ldan ni //
K12D0834_H0798:331a-7: ji ltar dmus long mdun du mdog bstan bzhin //
K12D0834_H0798:331a-8: 'di ni skal med rigs chad sa yin no //
K12D0834_H0798:331a-9: chos kyi dbyings kyis kun la khyab pa yis //
K12D0834_H0798:331a-10: bla med theg pa bsam yas gsungs pa yang //
K12D0834_H0798:331a-11: so so rang rig blo la snang bar zad //
K12D0834_H0798:331a-12: ngan song 'gro drug sna tshogs rgyu ba yang //
K12D0834_H0798:331a-13: 'khrul pa'i blo log rtog pa nyid snang ste //
K12D0834_H0798:331a-14: de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings la 'gyur ba med //
K12D0834_H0798:331a-15: mi dmigs rang rig goms byas bla na med pa'i mchog /
K12D0834_H0798:331a-16: log rtog bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin gyur na //
K12D0834_H0798:331a-17: dngos med mi sdug sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur //
K12D0834_H0798:331a-18: yang dag shes pa'i rang rig blo med na //
K12D0834_H0798:331a-19: bde gshegs zhing yang ngan song gnas su mthong //
K12D0834_H0798:331a-20: theg mchog mnyam pa'i don nyid rtogs pa ni //
K12D0834_H0798:331a-21: ngan song gnas nyid 'og min dga' ldan gnas //
K12D0834_H0798:331a-22: nam mkha'i dbyings ni de nyid bsam yas par //
K12D0834_H0798:331b-0: nyi zla gza' skar mtshan ma glog 'gyur @331b dang; ;'ja' tshon sprin mang sna tshogs 'khrugs gyur kyang //
K12D0834_H0798:331b-1: nam mkha'i dbyings la gyur cing nyams pa med //
K12D0834_H0798:331b-2: mi dmigs chos kyi dbyings ni bsam yas par /
K12D0834_H0798:331b-3: sku gsung yon tan 'phrin las rmad byung dang //
K12D0834_H0798:331b-4: 'jig rtog gtso mchog ma lus thams cad dang //
K12D0834_H0798:331b-5: 'khrul 'khor sdug bsngal sna tshogs rnam mang yang //
K12D0834_H0798:331b-6: de bzhin nyid la 'phel zhing bri ba med //
K12D0834_H0798:331b-7: ces rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o //
K12D0834_H0798:331b-8: rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las /
K12D0834_H0798:331b-9: thams cad la chos nyid kyi rgyu yod pa dang /
K12D0834_H0798:331b-11: rigs rgyud so sor dbye ba'i mdor bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o ////
K12D0834_H0798:331b-12: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs pa
K12D0834_H0798:331b-13: gcig tu gyur nas mnyam pa chen po'i tshul rdo
K12D0834_H0798:331b-14: rje'i dbyings su chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas
K12D0834_H0798:331b-15: pa'i ting nge 'dzin las mi g-yo bar chos thams
K12D0834_H0798:331b-16: cad ming tsam du gnas pa'i yi ge phreng ba
K12D0834_H0798:331b-17: 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'di sku gsung thugs rdo
K12D0834_H0798:331b-20: rab tu brtan gyur aa dkar las //
K12D0834_H0798:331b-21: shin tu phra ba'i aa rnams spro //
K12D0834_H0798:331b-22: phyogs kun gang bar gsal gyur nas //
K12D0834_H0798:331b-24: de las ming chags gsal bar kun //
K12D0834_H0798:331b-25: spro zhing bsdu ba'ang de bzhin no //
K12D0834_H0798:332a-1: ni rdo rje dngos grub kyi //
K12D0834_H0798:332a-2: rten 'byung ye shes rgyu yin no //
K12D0834_H0798:332a-8: pa pha ba bha ma; ya wa ra la /
K12D0834_H0798:332a-15: 'di dag phyung bas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa rnam pa drug tu g-yos /
K12D0834_H0798:332a-17: kun tu g-yos nas chos thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid du gyur to //
K12D0834_H0798:332a-18: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ched
K12D0834_H0798:332a-19: du brjod pa 'di brjod do; ;aa ni stong dang
K12D0834_H0798:332a-20: mi stong gi / dbu ma dmigs su yod ma yin //
K12D0834_H0798:332a-21: thams cad ming tsam sangs rgyas kun //
K12D0834_H0798:332a-22: yi ge'i phreng ba nyid la gnas //
K12D0834_H0798:332a-23: aa nyid sna tshogs bar snang ba'i //
K12D0834_H0798:332a-24: ka la sogs pa bzhi bcu gnyis //
K12D0834_H0798:332a-25: sgra yi ming gis thams cad bsdus //
K12D0834_H0798:332a-26: mngon rdzogs rgyal por de nyid nges //
K12D0834_H0798:332a-27: ae ma ho ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi; ;'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i ming //
K12D0834_H0798:332a-28: tshig rnams ma lus 'dzin pa'i gnas //
K12D0834_H0798:332a-29: sna tshogs don kun smra zhing ston //
K12D0834_H0798:332a-30: dngos med yi ge rang bzhin sems //
K12D0834_H0798:332a-31: bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs kyang //
K12D0834_H0798:332a-32: dbyibs dang kha dog ming tshogs kyis //
K12D0834_H0798:332a-33: rol pa cir yang sprul cing ston //
K12D0834_H0798:332b-0: phyogs bcu dus bzhi gshegs pa @332b yi; ;ye shes sems dpa'i sku gsung thugs //
K12D0834_H0798:332b-1: dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa lnga nyid //
K12D0834_H0798:332b-2: yi ge mgo nas ksha la rdzogs //
K12D0834_H0798:332b-3: sems ni rang bzhin yi ge ste //
K12D0834_H0798:332b-4: yi ge dngos po yod ma yin //
K12D0834_H0798:332b-5: dmigs med de nyid sna tshogs pa'i //
K12D0834_H0798:332b-6: sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo che //
K12D0834_H0798:332b-7: gsung thugs ni ngo mtshar gyi //
K12D0834_H0798:332b-9: dbyings la dbyings kyis bris pa ste; ;yi ge zhes ni de phyir brjod //
K12D0834_H0798:332b-10: mgo ni ma nor lam yin te //
K12D0834_H0798:332b-11: tsheg ni shes rab ming du smras //
K12D0834_H0798:332b-12: shad ni thabs chen tshigs su gcod //
K12D0834_H0798:332b-13: aa ni skye med de bzhin nyid //
K12D0834_H0798:332b-14: tha ni sgyu 'phrul rdo rje nyid //
K12D0834_H0798:332b-15: ta ni snang ba'i sgyu 'phrul nyid //
K12D0834_H0798:332b-16: da ni sgyu 'phrul yid bzhin nyid //
K12D0834_H0798:332b-17: dha ni sgyu 'phrul rnam dag nyid //
K12D0834_H0798:332b-18: na ni kun tu sgyu 'phrul nyid; ;tha ni dra bas mngon rdzogs nyid //
K12D0834_H0798:332b-19: ta ni dra bas brtan pa nyid //
K12D0834_H0798:332b-20: da ni dra bas lham me nyid //
K12D0834_H0798:332b-21: dha ni dra bas 'khyil ba nyid //
K12D0834_H0798:332b-22: na ni dra bas kun tu 'gyur //
K12D0834_H0798:332b-23: ka ni spyan gyi thugs kyi mchog /
K12D0834_H0798:332b-24: kha ni snyan gyi thugs kyi mchog /
K12D0834_H0798:332b-25: ga ni shangs kyi thugs kyi mchog /
K12D0834_H0798:332b-26: gha ni ljags kyi thugs kyi mchog /
K12D0834_H0798:332b-27: nga ni thugs kyang 'jig byed pa'o //
K12D0834_H0798:332b-28: tsa ni spyan gyi sku yi mchog /
K12D0834_H0798:332b-29: tsha ni snyan gyi sku yi mchog /
K12D0834_H0798:332b-30: dza ni shangs kyi sku yi mchog /
K12D0834_H0798:332b-31: dzha ni ljags kyi sku yi mchog /
K12D0834_H0798:333a-1: pa'o; ;pa ni spyan gyi gsung gi mchog /
K12D0834_H0798:333a-2: pha ni snyan gyi gsung mchog ste //
K12D0834_H0798:333a-3: ba ni shangs kyi gsung mchog yin //
K12D0834_H0798:333a-4: bha ni ljags kyi gsung gi mchog /
K12D0834_H0798:333a-5: ma ni gsung yang 'jig par byed //
K12D0834_H0798:333a-6: ya ni skye ba rnam par dag /
K12D0834_H0798:333a-7: wa ni gnas pa dag pa yin //
K12D0834_H0798:333a-8: ra ni 'jig pa dag pa ste //
K12D0834_H0798:333a-9: la ni stong pa dag pa'o //
K12D0834_H0798:333a-10: sha ni rtag med dag pa ste //
K12D0834_H0798:333a-11: sha ni chad pa'ang yod ma yin //
K12D0834_H0798:333a-12: sa ni mtha' bral bdag med pa //
K12D0834_H0798:333a-13: ha ni mtshan ma med pa nyid //
K12D0834_H0798:333a-14: ksha ni ye shes thugs kyi thugs //
K12D0834_H0798:333a-15: ai ni rdul snyed lha rnams su //
K12D0834_H0798:333a-16: a'i ni rdul snyed lha ma yin //
K12D0834_H0798:333a-17: au ni rdul snyed mi rnams su //
K12D0834_H0798:333a-18: a'u ni rdul snyed byol song rnams //
K12D0834_H0798:333a-19: ae ni rdul snyed yi dvags su //
K12D0834_H0798:333a-20: a'ee ni rdul snyed dmyal ba rnams //
K12D0834_H0798:333a-21: ao ni thams cad 'jig par byed //
K12D0834_H0798:333a-22: aoo ni thams cad 'jig pa yin //
K12D0834_H0798:333a-24: sku gsung thugs kyi phreng ba bsdus //
K12D0834_H0798:333a-26: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang
K12D0834_H0798:333a-27: gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi
K12D0834_H0798:333a-28: gsang ba 'di nyid sku gsung thugs dang yon tan
K12D0834_H0798:333a-29: 'phrin las rdo rje las byung ngo //
K12D0834_H0798:333a-31: thabs dang shes rab dgyes sprin byang chub sems tshogs rgyu 'khor lo //
K12D0834_H0798:333b-0: 'bras bu rgyal ba'i @333b smin grub ngo mtshar ming tshogs bzhi bcu gnyis //
K12D0834_H0798:333b-1: 'dus ma byas nyid 'dus byas rdo rje dkyil 'khor 'byin ba'i dam /
K12D0834_H0798:333b-2: 'da' bar mi mdzad dbang med rgyu rkyen tshogs pa'i mthu chen yin //
K12D0834_H0798:333b-4: rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o //
K12D0834_H0798:333b-5: zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yi ge'i 'khor lor gyur to //
K12D0834_H0798:333b-6: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las //
K12D0834_H0798:333b-7: yi ge'i phreng ba 'khor lo bkod pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o ////
K12D0834_H0798:333b-8: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las /
K12D0834_H0798:333b-9: shin tu gsang ba'i gsang sngags kyi rgyud de'i phyi
K12D0834_H0798:333b-10: ba dang nang pa thabs kyi rgyud gzhan las khams
K12D0834_H0798:333b-12: gtsug lag thams cad las kyang khams bco brgyad du bstan pa yin //
K12D0834_H0798:333b-14: shin tu zab ba'i phyir khams nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bstan te /
K12D0834_H0798:333b-15: lung gi spyi yang rgyud dang gsung rab thams cad
K12D0834_H0798:333b-16: 'byung ba'i gnas yin; gsang ba'i dbang po dang gsang

K12D0834_H0798:334a-13: rigs lnga yab yum bcu ru 'byor //

K12D0834_H0798:334b-8: bsdams dang mi gtong dbang bsgyur te //
K12D0834_H0798:334b-9: bde ba sgra snyan phyogs bcur sgrog /

K12D0834_H0798:335a-7: byang chub 'grub pa'i zhing yang yin //
K12D0834_H0798:335a-8: bde ba 'byin pa'i rgyu yang yin //

K12D0834_H0798:335a-10: dbang po rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyal //

K12D0834_H0798:335a-16: phun sum tshogs pa'i lhun grub rnams //
K12D0834_H0798:335a-17: gsang ba mchog gis 'byin par byed //
K12D0834_H0798:335a-18: 'di ni rtse gcig yin par gsungs //
K12D0834_H0798:335a-19: gsang ba'i don mchog 'di dag ni //

K12D0834_H0798:335a-22: khab len gyis ni lcags sdud ltar //
K12D0834_H0798:335a-23: mi 'dod bzhin du dbang med par //

K12D0834_H0798:335a-25: de bas 'di ni shin tu gsang bar bya //

K12D0834_H0798:335a-27: blo brtan snying rje che dang dad ldan ngang tshul
K12D0834_H0798:335b-0: bzang la @335b brten; ;gzhan du nam yang sbyin mi
K12D0834_H0798:335b-1: bya // zhes nyid la yang nyid brjod do //
K12D0834_H0798:335b-2: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /
K12D0834_H0798:335b-3: khams nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bsdus nas thams cad
K12D0834_H0798:335b-4: ma lus par dbyings su bkod pa'i le'u ste bdun
K12D0834_H0798:335b-5: pa'o //// de nas yi ge'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin
K12D0834_H0798:335b-6: bkod pa las sgyu 'phrul rnam par spros pa 'di
K12D0834_H0798:335b-8: rtsa ba med pa'i sems nyid ni //
K12D0834_H0798:335b-9: chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin //
K12D0834_H0798:335b-10: sems nyid yi ge'i rang bzhin te //
K12D0834_H0798:335b-11: yi ge yid bzhin rin chen sprin //

K12D0834_H0798:335b-23: 'jig rten khams ni gtor ba dang //

K12D0834_H0798:336a-2: ming tshig gzugs tshigs yid bzhin gyis //

K12D0834_H0798:336a-14: dngos rnams nyid na dngos med par //
K12D0834_H0798:336a-15: rtogs pa'i dbang bsgyur ting 'dzin yin //
K12D0834_H0798:336a-16: gang gis dmigs med mi shes pa //

K12D0834_H0798:336a-20: gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid ni //

K12D0834_H0798:336a-23: kha dog ma yin dbyibs ma yin //

K12D0834_H0798:336a-26: thabs kyi phyag rgya kun gyi rgyu //
K12D0834_H0798:336a-27: thabs las thabs byung thabs bsam yas //
K12D0834_H0798:336b-0: tha dad min @336b la tha dad pa'i //
K12D0834_H0798:336b-1: nang dang nang gi phyi rol pa //

K12D0834_H0798:336b-7: zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid gzigs mos mnyes par gyur to //
K12D0834_H0798:336b-8: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig phyung ngo //

K12D0834_H0798:336b-13: de nyid rdzogs pa'i ngang las dngos grub kun shar kun tu gnas //
K12D0834_H0798:336b-15: rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o //
K12D0834_H0798:336b-16: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /
K12D0834_H0798:336b-17: sgyu 'phrul sgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o ////
K12D0834_H0798:336b-18: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po

K12D0834_H0798:337a-5: chos rnams thams cad bdag med pa'i //
K12D0834_H0798:337a-6: dbyings su thim pa'i 'od zer gsal //
K12D0834_H0798:337a-7: gcig dang spros pa thams cad med //
K12D0834_H0798:337a-8: dkyil 'khor spros med zlum po'i tshul //
K12D0834_H0798:337a-9: ye nas mya ngan 'das pa'i chos //

K12D0834_H0798:337a-12: chos kyi 'khor lo yongs kyis bskor //
K12D0834_H0798:337a-13: thugs rje byin rlabs 'phros pa yis //

K12D0834_H0798:337a-15: ye shes lnga dang sku gsung thugs //
K12D0834_H0798:337a-16: byin rlabs ya mtshan bsam mi khyab //
K12D0834_H0798:337a-17: rang snang ba yi thabs las 'byung //
K12D0834_H0798:337a-18: bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs pa'i //
K12D0834_H0798:337a-19: thugs rje rgyas pa'i gzhal yas khang //
K12D0834_H0798:337a-20: dbus mtha' med par rgyas par gnas //

K12D0834_H0798:337a-25: nyi zla brtsegs pa'i gdan khri 'bar //
K12D0834_H0798:337a-26: ye nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir //
K12D0834_H0798:337a-28: zag med ye shes gter gyur pas //
K12D0834_H0798:337b-0: yid bzhin rin chen @337b 'bar ba'i gdan //
K12D0834_H0798:337b-1: ye nas mnyam nyid mi 'da'i phyir //

K12D0834_H0798:337b-5: thams cad la ni dbang sgyur phyir //
K12D0834_H0798:337b-6: 'jig rten lha chen rnams kyis bskor //
K12D0834_H0798:337b-7: gsang ba'i de nyid nges pa las //

K12D0834_H0798:337b-9: thams cad lha nyid rtag tu sbyor //

K12D0834_H0798:337b-14: byang chub sems dang tshogs mchog brten //
K12D0834_H0798:337b-15: zhes nyid la nyid bshad do //
K12D0834_H0798:337b-16: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /
K12D0834_H0798:337b-17: shin tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bsdus nas lhag pa'i gzugs brnyan bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o ////
K12D0834_H0798:337b-18: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang
K12D0834_H0798:337b-19: bzhin gcig dang du ma med pa bdag nyid thams

K12D0834_H0798:337b-22: nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
K12D0834_H0798:337b-23: ye shes phyogs bzhi dbus brtags te //

K12D0834_H0798:338a-3: 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas //
K12D0834_H0798:338a-4: gru chad bzhis brgyan par khyams dang //
K12D0834_H0798:338a-5: kun tu gru bzhi sgo khyud ldan //
K12D0834_H0798:338a-6: rol mo sna tshogs sprin phung bzhin //
K12D0834_H0798:338a-7: dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis kyis brgyan //
K12D0834_H0798:338a-8: seng+ge glang chen rta dang khyung //
K12D0834_H0798:338a-9: nam mkha' lding gi khri chen la //
K12D0834_H0798:338a-10: nyi zla padma rin po che //
K12D0834_H0798:338a-11: gdan la rdzogs dang sems dpa'i tshul //
K12D0834_H0798:338a-12: 'khor lo rgyal po rgyal mo dang //
K12D0834_H0798:338a-13: g-yas nas mthong thos snom pa dang //
K12D0834_H0798:338a-14: myong dang btsun mo'i tshogs su bcas //
K12D0834_H0798:338a-15: gru chad la ni mthong byed dang //
K12D0834_H0798:338a-16: thos byed snom byed myong byed rnams //
K12D0834_H0798:338a-17: btsun mo dag dang bcas par gnas //
K12D0834_H0798:338a-18: bar khyams la ni thub drug dang //
K12D0834_H0798:338a-19: mdun dang rgyab tu byed pa dang //
K12D0834_H0798:338a-20: bya ba dang ni gnas par bstan //

K12D0834_H0798:338a-22: btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas //
K12D0834_H0798:338a-23: rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che //
K12D0834_H0798:338a-25: autpal klu shing la sogs mtshan //
K12D0834_H0798:338a-26: mdzes tshul mnyes pa'i yo byad 'dzin //
K12D0834_H0798:338a-27: mthing ga dkar po ser le brgyan //
K12D0834_H0798:338a-28: ljang khu la sogs sna tshogs pa'i //
K12D0834_H0798:338a-29: mnyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul can //
K12D0834_H0798:338b-0: gsal @338b 'tsher lhun stug gzi byin can //
K12D0834_H0798:338b-3: dbus mtha' med par khyab pa yi //
K12D0834_H0798:338b-4: dkyil 'khor bsam pas lhun gyis grub //
K12D0834_H0798:338b-5: sku yi phyag rgya che mchog ni //
K12D0834_H0798:338b-6: de bzhin dbyings las ma g-yos kyang //

K12D0834_H0798:338b-9: stong nyid sgyu ma mig yor tshul //

K12D0834_H0798:338b-11: ma g-yos bzhin du sna tshogs bzhin //
K12D0834_H0798:338b-12: de'i tshe mi mthun sna tshogs la //
K12D0834_H0798:338b-13: so so 'dra bar snang ba ni //
K12D0834_H0798:338b-14: de bzhin nyid kyis ma bcos kyang //

K12D0834_H0798:338b-16: dper na me long chu zla bzhin //

K12D0834_H0798:359a-29: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kun //
K12D0834_H0798:359a-30: ma lus bar ni bsgoms par 'gyur //
K12D0834_H0798:359a-31: dus bzhi phyogs bcu gang nas kyang //
K12D0834_H0798:359a-32: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnyed mi 'gyur //
K12D0834_H0798:359b-0: sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs @359b rgyas te; ;sangs rgyas gzhan du ma tshol cig /
K12D0834_H0798:359b-1: dkyil 'khor kun tu rab sbyor bas //
K12D0834_H0798:359b-3: cho ga lhag gam ma tshang na //
K12D0834_H0798:359b-4: skyon nyid dag ste nyes pa med //
K12D0834_H0798:359b-5: ces ched du brjod pas rol mo'i sprin gyis mnyes par gyur to //
K12D0834_H0798:359b-6: rol mo'i sprin gyis mnyes par gyur ste sku gsung
K12D0834_H0798:359b-7: thugs dang yon tan 'phrin las rdo rje gsang ba'i
K12D0834_H0798:359b-9: aa ho: ma mthong rmongs la chags pa yis //
K12D0834_H0798:359b-10: chos rnams ming du brtags pa tsam //
K12D0834_H0798:359b-11: 'gro drug dus gnas ming tshogs khyad par rab snang ba'i //
K12D0834_H0798:359b-12: zab chen spyod yul log par rtog brtags ming tsam du //
K12D0834_H0798:359b-13: a'a li k'a li la sogs 'dod pa'i snying po nyid //
K12D0834_H0798:359b-14: phyag rgya glu tshig sku gsung thugs //
K12D0834_H0798:359b-15: thugs kyi thugs chen yon tan rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni //
K12D0834_H0798:359b-16: nyid de mnyam pa'i thugs su rab tu gsol //
K12D0834_H0798:359b-17: mnyam nyid khyab pa'i stangs dpyal yon tan mchog ste sngags kyi 'phrin las rdzogs //
K12D0834_H0798:359b-18: rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o //
K12D0834_H0798:359b-19: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /
K12D0834_H0798:359b-20: tshogs sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o ////
K12D0834_H0798:359b-21: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i
K12D0834_H0798:359b-22: sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thams cad gcig
K12D0834_H0798:359b-23: tu 'dus nas dgyes pa chen pos chos thams cad
K12D0834_H0798:359b-24: ye nas rdzogs pa chen por lhun gyis grub pa'i
K12D0834_H0798:359b-25: dam tshig shin tu gsang ba'i snying po'i sprin bkod
K12D0834_H0798:359b-26: pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched
K12D0834_H0798:360a-2: ma rtogs pa dang log par rtog //
K12D0834_H0798:360a-3: phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs //
K12D0834_H0798:360a-4: 'dul ba dgongs pa gsang ba dang //
K12D0834_H0798:360a-5: rang bzhin gsang ba'i don rnams ni //
K12D0834_H0798:360a-6: yi ge sgra btags ming tshogs la //
K12D0834_H0798:360a-7: brten pa'i tshog gis rab mchod te //
K12D0834_H0798:360a-9: ston pa rdo rje thugs la gnas //
K12D0834_H0798:360a-14: gsang ba'i thig le dkyil 'khor dbyings //
K12D0834_H0798:360a-15: sku gsung thugs rig kun mnga' ba'i //
K12D0834_H0798:360a-16: bder gshegs kun gyi snying po rdzogs //
K12D0834_H0798:360a-17: 'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum //
K12D0834_H0798:360a-18: chen po shes rab de bzhin te //
K12D0834_H0798:360a-19: byang chub sems ni rdo rje tshogs //
K12D0834_H0798:360a-20: dbang po yul dus rig pa'i rnams //
K12D0834_H0798:360a-21: kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khor la //
K12D0834_H0798:360a-22: bdag nyid chen po lhag pa yi //
K12D0834_H0798:360a-23: thugs kyi ye shes lngas blta zhing //
K12D0834_H0798:360a-24: snying po thig le mnyam sbyor bas //
K12D0834_H0798:360a-25: bde ba'i ye shes rol mo yis //
K12D0834_H0798:360a-26: ye shes dgyes la mnyes par 'bul //
K12D0834_H0798:360a-27: zag pa med pa'i bsod nams kyis //
K12D0834_H0798:360a-28: ye shes sgyu ma rang snang ba //
K12D0834_H0798:360a-29: rol mo'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas mchog /
K12D0834_H0798:360a-30: gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings //
K12D0834_H0798:360a-31: de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos //
K12D0834_H0798:360a-32: phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i //
K12D0834_H0798:360b-0: sku gsung yon tan 'phrin @360b las thugs //
K12D0834_H0798:360b-1: ma lus bdag nyid zhal mthong ba //
K12D0834_H0798:360b-2: dbang sgyur mchog nyid dam pa yin //
K12D0834_H0798:360b-4: rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub //
K12D0834_H0798:360b-5: rgyun du dkyil 'khor ma lus thob //
K12D0834_H0798:360b-6: rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor las //
K12D0834_H0798:360b-9: sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor sgrol ba yis; ;bya byed med par dkyil 'khor spyod //
K12D0834_H0798:360b-10: ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la //
K12D0834_H0798:360b-11: thos bsam sgom pa'i mnyam sbyor gyis //
K12D0834_H0798:360b-12: rab byung kun nam lhun gyis grub //
K12D0834_H0798:360b-13: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
K12D0834_H0798:360b-14: 'da' bar mi mdzad dam tshig mchog /
K12D0834_H0798:360b-15: gang zhig 'di la mos gyur pa //
K12D0834_H0798:360b-16: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis //
K12D0834_H0798:360b-17: phyogs dus kun nas thams cad du //
K12D0834_H0798:360b-18: dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yis //
K12D0834_H0798:360b-19: nye ba'i sras su dgongs par 'gyur //
K12D0834_H0798:360b-20: bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du //
K12D0834_H0798:360b-21: shin tu sbyangs la rab gnas shing //
K12D0834_H0798:360b-22: dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yi //
K12D0834_H0798:360b-24: 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na //
K12D0834_H0798:360b-25: 'das dang da ltar byung ba yi //
K12D0834_H0798:360b-26: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pas //
K12D0834_H0798:360b-27: brnyes pas sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs //
K12D0834_H0798:360b-28: 'byung dang ma thongs thams cad kun //
K12D0834_H0798:360b-30: 'di ni gsang chen nges pa yi //
K12D0834_H0798:360b-31: 'bras bu lam du gyur pa yin //
K12D0834_H0798:360b-32: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la //
K12D0834_H0798:361a-2: btsal kyang rgyal bas mi rnyed do //
K12D0834_H0798:361a-3: kun gyi phyag rgya chen po mchog /
K12D0834_H0798:361a-4: thos bsam sgom la rab sbyangs pa'i //
K12D0834_H0798:361a-5: shes rab mig ldan rnams kyis gzung //
K12D0834_H0798:361a-6: snod ldan ngang tshul bzang la brtan //
K12D0834_H0798:361a-7: lus dang longs spyod gtong la sbyin //
K12D0834_H0798:361a-8: gzhan du nam yang sbyin mi bya //
K12D0834_H0798:361a-9: rmongs la 'phyar bas gal te sbyin //
K12D0834_H0798:361a-10: dus min par ni srog zad nas //
K12D0834_H0798:361a-11: bsregs dang sbrebs par yun ring gnas //
K12D0834_H0798:361a-12: zhes de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du brjod do //
K12D0834_H0798:361a-17: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /
K12D0834_H0798:361a-18: shin tu gsang ba man ngag gi snying po'i le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o ////
K12D0834_H0798:361a-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos
K12D0834_H0798:361a-20: dgyes pa chen po'i ngang las gsang ba 'byung ba
K12D0834_H0798:361a-21: bya ba 'di ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do
K12D0834_H0798:361a-22: // ae ma'o; ;thams cad ma lus dus gsum bder gshegs mchog /
K12D0834_H0798:361a-23: gdod nas ma skyes rnam dag byang chub sems //
K12D0834_H0798:361a-24: rang bzhin dbyer med gdod mtha' mi 'byed cing //
K12D0834_H0798:361a-25: ye nas mnyam pas rgyal ba rgya mtsho yin //
K12D0834_H0798:361a-26: 'gro 'ong med par dus gsum gcig car rdzogs //
K12D0834_H0798:361a-27: dbye bsal med cing bzang ngan blang dor med //
K12D0834_H0798:361b-0: rnam rtog nyid na ye shes rang bzhin @361b te; ;rnam rtog mi skyed ye shes brjod du med //
K12D0834_H0798:361b-1: bdag tu med pa'i skyes mchog sngon sbyangs pa //
K12D0834_H0798:361b-3: snga rabs phyis 'byung dag dang dbyer med pa'i //
K12D0834_H0798:361b-4: mngon sum sangs rgyas skyes mchog de dag la //
K12D0834_H0798:361b-5: bskal pa 'ga' nas shes rab blo sbyangs pa //
K12D0834_H0798:361b-6: dad ldan 'ga' yis 'tsham par ci thig gi /
K12D0834_H0798:361b-7: bdag nyid ma mthong shes rgyud ma 'byongs pa //
K12D0834_H0798:361b-8: gzhan du tshol zhing rmongs pa'i sems can gyis //
K12D0834_H0798:361b-9: bstan kyang ma thos mtshon kyang ma mthong ba //
K12D0834_H0798:361b-10: bdag cag gzhan du tshol bas sangs mi rgyas //
K12D0834_H0798:361b-11: de dang ma bral ston pa mi mthong zhing //
K12D0834_H0798:361b-12: bgrod par 'dod pas phyin par mi nus te //
K12D0834_H0798:361b-13: shes rgyud ci yin gang gis ngo shes shing //
K12D0834_H0798:361b-14: bya byed las 'phags gyin 'da' 'dug byed pa //
K12D0834_H0798:361b-15: gang zhig blo la dpyod pa byang chub thob //
K12D0834_H0798:361b-16: ma spangs mtshan ma kun bral yong med pas //
K12D0834_H0798:361b-17: dran byed mi spong 'khor rgyun mi 'byed de //
K12D0834_H0798:361b-18: ma snyigs mi 'byed mngon sum sangs rgyas la //
K12D0834_H0798:361b-19: blo yi rig pas dpyod cing nan tan dang //
K12D0834_H0798:361b-20: mchong cing brten pas byang chub thob mngon te //
K12D0834_H0798:361b-21: nam mkha' bzung bas sprin gyis khebs par 'gyur //
K12D0834_H0798:361b-22: nam mkha' med par gang gis shes pa na //
K12D0834_H0798:361b-23: sprin zhig 'byung zhing khebs par mi srid do //
K12D0834_H0798:361b-24: rnam par rtog pa'i g-yung drung sangs rgyas la //
K12D0834_H0798:361b-25: thams cad ye nas mnyam gnas rnam dag cing //
K12D0834_H0798:361b-26: mi rtag sa ler gnas la rtog pa mdzad //
K12D0834_H0798:362a-2: bdag med bdag chen thams cad 'byung ba'i gter //
K12D0834_H0798:362a-3: ma bkag pa las rgyu zhing 'byung med pa'i //
K12D0834_H0798:362a-4: thams cad sems kyi ngang ste sems zhes gdags su med //
K12D0834_H0798:362a-5: ma bcos lhun gnas ye nas byang chub cing //
K12D0834_H0798:362a-6: thob rgyu med pas ye nas bder gshegs yin //
K12D0834_H0798:362a-7: zhes brjod pas chos dang ye shes kyi khams thams
K12D0834_H0798:362a-8: cad rang bzhin sangs rgyas bar de bzhin gshegs pa
K12D0834_H0798:362a-10: mkhyen nas ji bzhin pa'i bdag nyid chen po de
K12D0834_H0798:362a-11: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang
K12D0834_H0798:362a-12: thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dra ba las rdo rje
K12D0834_H0798:362a-14: ae ma'o ma bsgrubs grub chen po //
K12D0834_H0798:362a-15: grub pa chen po ye shes che //
K12D0834_H0798:362a-16: blang dor med pa'i sa chen po //
K12D0834_H0798:362a-18: rtog pa'i ye shes yid bzhin gter //
K12D0834_H0798:362a-19: thams cad la yang me long bzhin //
K12D0834_H0798:362a-20: bltas kyang gzugs brnyan mi snang ngo //
K12D0834_H0798:362a-21: gang na gsang chen 'di yod par //
K12D0834_H0798:362a-22: me ma mur gyi dong 'bogs la //
K12D0834_H0798:362a-23: sbu gri so ni gtams pa la /
K12D0834_H0798:362a-25: khong na gnas pa'i yang khong du //
K12D0834_H0798:362a-26: lcags kyi sgrom bu kha bsdam mo //
K12D0834_H0798:362a-27: dbyings nyid la ni nyid spyod phyir //
K12D0834_H0798:362a-28: dbyings nyid mchog gi gnas la spyod //
K12D0834_H0798:362a-29: de nyid mi gnas mya ngan 'das //
K12D0834_H0798:362a-30: rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o //
K12D0834_H0798:362a-31: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid pa las /
K12D0834_H0798:362a-32: gsang ba chen po man ngag gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu drug pa'o ////
K12D0834_H0798:362b-0: @362b de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen
K12D0834_H0798:362b-1: pos mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs nas nyid kyi
K12D0834_H0798:362b-2: sku la thams cad ma lus par ston te ched
K12D0834_H0798:362b-6: snga phyi med par mnyam yin par //
K12D0834_H0798:362b-7: nges pa med par yang dag gsungs //
K12D0834_H0798:362b-9: rang dang spyi ru bstan pa dang //
K12D0834_H0798:362b-10: ji snyed brtan g-yo la sogs pa //
K12D0834_H0798:362b-11: sgyu ma mig yor tshul yin te //
K12D0834_H0798:362b-12: skyes bu blo rtsal rab ldan pas //
K12D0834_H0798:362b-13: de la rtag tu mnyam sbyor zhing //
K12D0834_H0798:362b-14: sems can kun gyi zhing gyur pa //
K12D0834_H0798:362b-15: de dag gnyis med dbyings su sbyor //
K12D0834_H0798:362b-16: thams cad thabs kyi mtshan nyid de //
K12D0834_H0798:362b-17: thabs la thabs ni rnam par sbyor //
K12D0834_H0798:362b-18: thabs dang thabs las byung ba yi //
K12D0834_H0798:362b-19: de ni byang chub rdo rje mchog /
K12D0834_H0798:362b-20: ji snyed brjod pa'i kha rgyud kyang //
K12D0834_H0798:362b-21: yang dag don gyi snying po ni //
K12D0834_H0798:362b-22: gang nas btsal kyang mi rnyed de //
K12D0834_H0798:362b-23: rang rig sgrib med dag pa yin //
K12D0834_H0798:362b-24: de la rtag 'grus goms pa ni //
K12D0834_H0798:362b-25: bsnyen pa'i dam pa de yin te //
K12D0834_H0798:362b-26: de ni ma nor lam yin par //
K12D0834_H0798:362b-27: aa yis bo dhi rab tu bsdus //
K12D0834_H0798:362b-28: de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid ni //
K12D0834_H0798:362b-29: gcig gam 'di zhes brjod du med //
K12D0834_H0798:362b-31: byin rlabs bsam yas mtha' yas mchog /
K12D0834_H0798:362b-32: don bsdus gsung rab bzhi bcu gnyis //
K12D0834_H0798:362b-33: de las lhag pa'i don smra ba //
K12D0834_H0798:362b-34: de ni rnam dag lam min te //
K12D0834_H0798:362b-35: rang blos bsam pa'i 'khrul pa yin //
K12D0834_H0798:362b-36: thams cad rang rig byang chub sems //
K12D0834_H0798:363a-2: tshad bzhis phab pa'i don yin te //
K12D0834_H0798:363a-3: dag pa rnam gsum tshul bsgom zhing //
K12D0834_H0798:363a-4: 'bru lngar bsdus pa thabs che te //
K12D0834_H0798:363a-5: 'gro ba kun la rang rig gnas //
K12D0834_H0798:363a-6: bya ba med la byas pa med //
K12D0834_H0798:363a-7: zad pa'i dus med yid bzhin gter //
K12D0834_H0798:363a-8: bum pa bzang dang yid bzhin mdzod //
K12D0834_H0798:363a-9: za ma tog dang yid bzhin rgyal //
K12D0834_H0798:363a-10: gzhan nas yong 'ong ma yin te //
K12D0834_H0798:363a-11: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /
K12D0834_H0798:363a-12: bsnyen pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o ////
K12D0834_H0798:363a-13: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
K12D0834_H0798:363a-14: gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag po sangs rgyas thams cad
K12D0834_H0798:363a-15: kyi ngo bo nyid kyis khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du
K12D0834_H0798:363a-18: bdag tu rmongs pa'i rtog pas brtags pa la mngon par zhen pa dang /
K12D0834_H0798:363a-19: yang dag pa'i lam dang bral ba dag gab pa'i
K12D0834_H0798:363a-20: gsang ba ma rtogs par sbas pa'i gsang ba la
K12D0834_H0798:363a-21: mngon par 'tshal nas rgyu dang 'bras bur rmongs pas
K12D0834_H0798:363a-22: / srid pa'i sa bon rtsub mos 'phangs nas mtshams
K12D0834_H0798:363a-23: med pa'i rab tu cha ba'i dmyal bar skyes so
K12D0834_H0798:363a-24: / // de rab tu tsha ba'i sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs pa dang /
K12D0834_H0798:363a-25: 'dod pas gdungs nas 'di bas shin tu grang mang
K12D0834_H0798:363a-26: ci ma rung snyam pa'i mod la rab tu sbrebs
K12D0834_H0798:363a-27: pa padma ltar gas pa'i sdug bsngal drag po dag
K12D0834_H0798:363a-28: gis rab tu nyen pa de lta bu'i sdug bsngal
K12D0834_H0798:363a-29: rab tu tsha ba la sogs pa brgyad dang /
K12D0834_H0798:363a-30: shin tu grang ba la sogs pa brgyad po dag
K12D0834_H0798:363b-0: tu 'jig @363b rten gyi khams brgyud cing bskal pa
K12D0834_H0798:363b-1: chen po stong phrag bcu gnyis su myong ngo //
K12D0834_H0798:363b-2: de nas rnam par smin pa de zad pa dang
K12D0834_H0798:363b-3: yi dvags ltog pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis
K12D0834_H0798:363b-4: nyen pa dang / 'dod pa'i dngos po rnams yid du mi 'ong ba dang /
K12D0834_H0798:363b-5: gdug cing rtsub pa'i dngos po sna tshogs su 'gyur pa dang /
K12D0834_H0798:363b-6: yong med par yang 'gyur zhing shin tu rid cing bskams pa dang /
K12D0834_H0798:363b-7: lus dang yan lag dang dbang po mi 'tsham par gyur pa dang /
K12D0834_H0798:363b-8: bskal pa chen po drug tu skyes so //
K12D0834_H0798:363b-9: de nas las kyi sgrib pa rtsub mo'i rnam par
K12D0834_H0798:363b-10: smin pa de khad kyis bslabs pa dang sngon gyi
K12D0834_H0798:363b-11: srid pas mtshams sbyar nas yi dvags srin po chen
K12D0834_H0798:363b-12: po rab tu gdug pa gtum po lus gcig la
K12D0834_H0798:363b-15: lus brgya mgo gcig pa dang /
K12D0834_H0798:363b-19: gdug pa'i lag cha sna tshogs pa thogs pa 'khor rab tu mang po dang /
K12D0834_H0798:363b-21: 'jigs pa'i nga ro sna tshogs sgrog pa /
K12D0834_H0798:363b-24: dri dang; kha rlangs kyis thams cad skyi bung zhes byed pa /
K12D0834_H0798:363b-25: rab tu 'jigs pa'i rlung grang ba dang tsha ba'i
K12D0834_H0798:363b-26: dbugs kyis phyogs kun tu khams 'khrug par byed pa

K12D0834_H0798:438b-18: bro gar rtse 'jo'i le'u ste bdun cu rtsa gcig pa'o ////
K12D0834_H0798:438b-19: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po
K12D0834_H0798:438b-20: sgyu 'phrul dra ba las sku'i dkyil 'khor mngon du
K12D0834_H0798:438b-21: phyung ste 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12D0834_H0798:438b-22: de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings ldan pas //
K12D0834_H0798:438b-23: sgyu dang dra ba 'brel gyur nas //
K12D0834_H0798:438b-24: sku mchog rdo rje 'od snang bas //
K12D0834_H0798:438b-25: mthun pa'i rdo rje rang snang ngo //
K12D0834_H0798:438b-26: rgyud drug 'khor ba'i lus snang ba //
K12D0834_H0798:438b-27: rnam rtog mthun pa'i las snang ngo //
K12D0834_H0798:438b-28: de bzhin sku mchog dri bral dang //
K12D0834_H0798:438b-29: bder gshegs sku lngar mdor bsdus te //
K12D0834_H0798:439a-2: bla med gzugs dang rdo rje sku //
K12D0834_H0798:439a-3: de la sogs de sku bsam yas //
K12D0834_H0798:439a-4: phyogs bcu dus bzhi sku ston pa //
K12D0834_H0798:439a-6: byang chub mchog gi rdo rje sku //
K12D0834_H0798:439a-7: chags med zhing du sku ston cing //
K12D0834_H0798:439a-8: dbyings las ma g-yos bzhin du snang //
K12D0834_H0798:439a-9: sku snang de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings //
K12D0834_H0798:439a-10: rnam dag sku ston ma yin te //
K12D0834_H0798:439a-11: log 'gro rtog pa thams cad la //
K12D0834_H0798:439a-12: so sor 'dul ba'i skur yang ston //
K12D0834_H0798:439a-13: de tshe skye shi med pa'i sku //
K12D0834_H0798:439a-14: las dang ma chags padma'i sku //
K12D0834_H0798:439a-15: thar dang mthar sna tshogs kyis //
K12D0834_H0798:439a-16: sna tshogs snang la gnas pa med //
K12D0834_H0798:439a-17: snang dang mi snang gnyi ga med //
K12D0834_H0798:439a-18: de ltar rtog pa'i rigs mchog ni //
K12D0834_H0798:439a-19: badzra zhes ni gdags pa yin //
K12D0834_H0798:439a-20: ji snyed sku ston bsam yas pa //
K12D0834_H0798:439a-21: thams cad ma lus rdo rje bsdus //
K12D0834_H0798:439a-22: 'khor lo zhes kyang brjod pa ni //
K12D0834_H0798:439a-23: de la sogs te sku bsam yas //
K12D0834_H0798:439a-24: byang chub thabs kyi dkyil nas byung //
K12D0834_H0798:439a-25: sku ni sna tshogs thams cad kyang //
K12D0834_H0798:439a-27: dbyings nyid las ni dbyings snang zad //
K12D0834_H0798:439a-28: thugs nyid gsung gi dkyil 'khor snang //
K12D0834_H0798:439a-29: gsung nyid sku yi dkyil 'khor te //
K12D0834_H0798:439a-30: dbyer med de bzhin yong gis so //
K12D0834_H0798:439a-32: rtag tu dus gsum thams cad du //
K12D0834_H0798:439a-33: bdag dang bdag gi dbyer med pas //
K12D0834_H0798:439b-0: ye nas @439b dkyil 'khor yin par brtag /
K12D0834_H0798:439b-1: 'di ni dngos grub mchog yin par //
K12D0834_H0798:439b-2: kun tu rgyal gyis de skad bshad //
K12D0834_H0798:439b-3: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las /
K12D0834_H0798:439b-4: sku'i dkyil 'khor mngon du phyung ba zhes bya ba'i
K12D0834_H0798:439b-5: le'u sku'i dkyil 'khor zab tu ni rgyud kyi rgyal
K12D0834_H0798:439b-6: po phyi ma las bshad de /
K12D0834_H0798:439b-8: rang bzhin sku'i dkyil 'khor du bsdu ba'i le'u ste bdun cu rtsa gnyis pa'o ////
K12D0834_H0798:439b-9: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las /
K12D0834_H0798:439b-10: ting nge 'dzin gyi rim par sbyar zhing dngos grub
K12D0834_H0798:439b-11: myur du len pa'i thabs dra ba las 'di skad
K12D0834_H0798:439b-12: ces gsungs so // dkyil 'khor bsam yas dngos grub ni //
K12D0834_H0798:439b-13: mi dmigs dbyings nas don 'byin te //
K12D0834_H0798:439b-14: ma bcos ji bzhin ngang bzhag dang //
K12D0834_H0798:439b-16: mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las //
K12D0834_H0798:439b-17: ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang sgyur na //
K12D0834_H0798:439b-18: ye shes sprul pa sna tshogs 'grub //
K12D0834_H0798:439b-19: spyod yul thams cad mandal la //
K12D0834_H0798:439b-20: ye shes dkyil 'khor thar byed skyong //
K12D0834_H0798:439b-21: longs spyod sku dang sangs rgyas zhing //
K12D0834_H0798:439b-23: yangs shing rgya che lhun grub ni //
K12D0834_H0798:439b-24: phyi nang snod bcud ye nas dag /
K12D0834_H0798:439b-25: dag rtogs nyid kyang dbyings nyid yin //
K12D0834_H0798:439b-26: de nas rdo rje mnyam yin no //
K12D0834_H0798:439b-28: shin tu phra zhing zab par bsgom //
K12D0834_H0798:439b-29: bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnams ni //
K12D0834_H0798:440a-2: ting 'dzin de ni goms pa dang //
K12D0834_H0798:440a-3: thams cad sgyu ma mig yor dang //
K12D0834_H0798:440a-4: sprul pa'i tshul du shes par bya //
K12D0834_H0798:440a-5: de bzhin yang nas yang goms nas //
K12D0834_H0798:440a-6: de nas phra mo'i ting 'dzin bsgom //
K12D0834_H0798:440a-7: phyi nang snod bcud h'um du bsdu //
K12D0834_H0798:440a-8: gang bsgrub yi ge so so ste //
K12D0834_H0798:440a-9: spyir ni gang bsgom kun tu 'dra //
K12D0834_H0798:440a-10: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'du; ;yan lag lnga dang rnam shes nyid //
K12D0834_H0798:440a-11: yi ge h'um du shin tu bsdu //
K12D0834_H0798:440a-12: nrai yi mig gis bltar yod par //
K12D0834_H0798:440a-13: yang nas yang du 'dris pa dang //
K12D0834_H0798:440a-15: phyogs bcu dus bzhi gang ba dang //
K12D0834_H0798:440a-16: slar yang h'um la bstim par bya //
K12D0834_H0798:440a-17: h'um nyid mi dmigs dbyings su thim //
K12D0834_H0798:440a-19: shin tu 'tsher bar gsal bsgoms la //
K12D0834_H0798:440a-20: thams cad aa ru gyur par bsgom //
K12D0834_H0798:440a-22: aa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor spro //
K12D0834_H0798:440a-23: ae ma gsal bar 'byor gyur nas //
K12D0834_H0798:440a-24: nyi zla gang ba'i nyi zlar bsgom; ;hr'i gsal padma chags med bsgom //
K12D0834_H0798:440a-25: rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas bsgom //
K12D0834_H0798:440a-26: nyi zla gdan dang gzhal yas khang //
K12D0834_H0798:440a-27: thams cad bsdu zhing phra bar bsgom //
K12D0834_H0798:440a-28: de bzhin yi ge h'um gnas pas //
K12D0834_H0798:440a-29: mthing ga 'tsher la gnas pa yi //
K12D0834_H0798:440a-32: shin tu rdo rje 'od zer 'phro bar bsgom //
K12D0834_H0798:440b-1: dbyings su yang ni bstim par bya //
K12D0834_H0798:440b-2: de nyid sems dpa'i skur gyur nas //
K12D0834_H0798:440b-3: shin tu phra zhing 'dus par bsgom //
K12D0834_H0798:440b-4: de bzhin gnyis med gsal gyur nas //
K12D0834_H0798:440b-5: sku gcig rdo rje dril bur bsgom //
K12D0834_H0798:440b-6: de bzhin nyid du gyur pa dang //
K12D0834_H0798:440b-7: dbu gsum phyag drug nyid du bsgom //
K12D0834_H0798:440b-8: gzhan yang khro 'dul sna tshogs bsgom //
K12D0834_H0798:440b-9: blo yi shes rab che chung las //
K12D0834_H0798:440b-10: rim pa bzhin du bsgom par bya //
K12D0834_H0798:440b-11: yang na gcig car bsgom par bya //
K12D0834_H0798:440b-12: nyi zla gza' skar dus gcig tu //
K12D0834_H0798:440b-13: chu dkyil dvangs par gsal ba bzhin //
K12D0834_H0798:440b-14: de ltar goms rtogs rigs mchog des //
K12D0834_H0798:440b-15: ji ltar dbang bsgyur bzhin du 'grub //
K12D0834_H0798:440b-17: chu rgyun bzlog dang rlung mi 'gul //
K12D0834_H0798:440b-18: ri brag la sogs thogs med 'dzul //
K12D0834_H0798:440b-19: chu la mi 'bying mes mi chig /
K12D0834_H0798:440b-21: mi snang ba dang mang por sprul //
K12D0834_H0798:440b-22: gzhan yang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin //
K12D0834_H0798:440b-23: lha srin rnams la dbang ba sgyur zhing //
K12D0834_H0798:440b-24: tshe dang dus la bsring bstung dang //
K12D0834_H0798:440b-25: stong gsum yungs 'brur bskyed pa dang //
K12D0834_H0798:440b-26: ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub //
K12D0834_H0798:440b-27: sbrul dang gcan gzan gdug pa rnams //
K12D0834_H0798:440b-29: bdud dang gdug pa la sogs pas //
K12D0834_H0798:440b-31: lus ma spangs par rig 'dzin sa //
K12D0834_H0798:440b-32: ye shes bsod nams longs spyod kyis //
K12D0834_H0798:441a-2: thugs rje sprul pa'i byin rlabs kyis //
K12D0834_H0798:441a-3: so sor thar pa'i lam yang ston //
K12D0834_H0798:441a-4: 'gro ba ma lus don yang byed //
K12D0834_H0798:441a-5: las rnams thams cad kun byas nas //
K12D0834_H0798:441a-6: skye 'chi med pa'i g-yung drung thob //
K12D0834_H0798:441a-7: mtshan dang dpe byad kun gyis brgyan //
K12D0834_H0798:441a-8: bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen lnga //
K12D0834_H0798:441a-9: mthar phyin bya ba med pa 'grub //
K12D0834_H0798:441a-10: bsgrub med spang med chos kyi dbyings //
K12D0834_H0798:441a-12: de ltar bsgrubs te bsgoms byas nas //
K12D0834_H0798:441a-13: 'bras bu mngon du ma gyur kyang //
K12D0834_H0798:441a-14: tshe rabs skye ba thams cad du //
K12D0834_H0798:441a-15: las ngan kun tu skye mi 'gyur //
K12D0834_H0798:441a-16: theg pa dman par yong mi 'gyur //
K12D0834_H0798:441a-18: zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o //
K12D0834_H0798:441a-19: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las /
K12D0834_H0798:441a-20: shin tu gsang bar bya ba rgyud dngos grub thob
K12D0834_H0798:441a-21: par bya ba'i le'u ste bdun cu rtsa gsum pa'o
K12D0834_H0798:441a-22: //// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal
K12D0834_H0798:441a-23: po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las hom rnams kyi 'phrin
K12D0834_H0798:441a-25: dang por de bzhin nyid du gsal zhing 'dris par bsgom /
K12D0834_H0798:441a-26: de nas bdag gi snying gar aa gsal zhing 'tsher ba gcig bsgom mo //
K12D0834_H0798:441a-27: aa de shin tu gsal bar gyur pa dang phyogs bcur 'od du 'phros par bsgom /
K12D0834_H0798:441a-28: 'od de slar aa la bsdu zhing bstim /
K12D0834_H0798:441b-0: ma dang aa las nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bstim zhing @441b 'tsher la gsal bar bsgom //
K12D0834_H0798:441b-1: hr'i las padma'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgom /
K12D0834_H0798:441b-3: snying gi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje sems dpa' tshon gang ba gcig phyag rgya dang bcas par bsgom /
K12D0834_H0798:441b-4: bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi sngags dang /
K12D0834_H0798:441b-6: phyag rgya yang gsal bar bzlas /
K12D0834_H0798:441b-10: tshogs dang mchod pa yang bya /
K12D0834_H0798:441b-11: mang po mi nus pa'i don tu hom gang bgyi yang rung /
K12D0834_H0798:441b-12: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi gtso bor spyi ni /
K12D0834_H0798:441b-13: rdo rje sems dpa' drag po yang rdo rje /
K12D0834_H0798:441b-15: rgyas pa ratna he ru ka /
K12D0834_H0798:441b-16: zhi ba buddha he ru ka /
K12D0834_H0798:441b-18: ae hye hi mah'a k'a ru ni ka zhes hom gang byed pa'i lha gtso bo nas spyan drang /
K12D0834_H0798:441b-21: drag po'i mgor ni sngags ril h'um/
K12D0834_H0798:441b-22: zhi ba la mgor ril aam/
K12D0834_H0798:441b-23: bar ma rnams la yang de bzhin sbyar /
K12D0834_H0798:441b-25: gang mdzad pa'i gtso bo nas zhi la sh'antim bsnan /
K12D0834_H0798:441b-26: spyi la so so rang sngags rdzogs /
K12D0834_H0798:441b-31: spyi gang yang rung gru gsum dang thod pa kha gdangs so //
K12D0834_H0798:441b-34: chags med do; ;phyag rgya rnam pa bdun la phyag rgya chen po dang /
K12D0834_H0798:441b-35: chos nyid kyi phyag rgya dang /
K12D0834_H0798:441b-36: dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang /
K12D0834_H0798:441b-38: thabs dang shes rab kyi phyag rgya dang /
K12D0834_H0798:442a-2: lhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'o //
K12D0834_H0798:442a-3: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las /
K12D0834_H0798:442a-4: ho ma rnam bzhi'i le'u ste bdun cu rtsa bzhi pa'o //
K12D0834_H0798:442a-5: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po
K12D0834_H0798:442a-6: sgyu 'phrul dra ba las rmad du byung ba'i dam
K12D0834_H0798:442a-7: tshig bco lnga mdo 'di ltar yang bshad de /
K12D0834_H0798:442a-8: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis //
K12D0834_H0798:442a-9: thams cad mnyam pa'i ngang nyid du //
K12D0834_H0798:442a-10: dbyings su ro gcig de bsdus te //
K12D0834_H0798:442a-11: don du mi 'gyur yong ma gsungs //
K12D0834_H0798:442a-12: yon tan mchog gi 'dod pa ni //
K12D0834_H0798:442a-13: snang srid ma lus thams cad kun //
K12D0834_H0798:442a-14: mnyam pa'i zhing du sbyor bas na //
K12D0834_H0798:442a-15: chags pa med pa'i tshul du spyod //
K12D0834_H0798:442a-16: 'di ni rnam dag legs pa'i lam //
K12D0834_H0798:442a-17: byang chub mchog tu 'gro ba'i gnas //
K12D0834_H0798:442a-18: bde chen mi zad gter du 'gyur //
K12D0834_H0798:442a-19: cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje'i sku //
K12D0834_H0798:442a-20: nyon mongs sdug bsngal 'dod chags ni //
K12D0834_H0798:442a-21: lus dang zas kyis bsgribs 'gyur te //
K12D0834_H0798:442a-22: yi dvags gnas nas gnas su 'gro //
K12D0834_H0798:442a-23: skom dang bkres pas nyon mongs 'gyur //
K12D0834_H0798:442a-24: rnag khrag ngan skyug rtag tu mthong //
K12D0834_H0798:442a-25: bde ba spyod pa'i dbang yang med //
K12D0834_H0798:442a-26: rtsub cing gdug pas srung bar 'gyur //
K12D0834_H0798:442a-27: thugs rje chen bo'i zhe sdang ni //
K12D0834_H0798:442a-28: 'khor ba'i mya ngan sgo bcad cing //
K12D0834_H0798:442a-29: bde gshegs lam du 'dzud par byed //
K12D0834_H0798:442a-30: yang dag don dang ldan par 'gyur //
K12D0834_H0798:442a-31: thugs rjes tshul gyis khro ston zhing //
K12D0834_H0798:442b-0: shin @442b tu mnyam pa'i ngang du 'jug /
K12D0834_H0798:442b-1: rdo rje sems dpa'i zhi ba yis //
K12D0834_H0798:442b-4: ye shes gsal ba'i bde ba ni //
K12D0834_H0798:442b-5: bdag dang bdag gi dbyer med de //
K12D0834_H0798:442b-6: rang bzhin med pa'i dbyings su rol //
K12D0834_H0798:442b-7: thams cad brjod du med pa'i ngang //
K12D0834_H0798:442b-8: kun tu khyab pa'i sku mnga' ba //
K12D0834_H0798:442b-9: shin tu 'od gsal ba rnam dag lam //
K12D0834_H0798:442b-10: byang chub sems dpa'i sgrib pa sbyong //
K12D0834_H0798:442b-11: sems can nyon mongs dug sel 'gyur; ;thams cad zhing sbyong nga rgyal ni //
K12D0834_H0798:442b-12: yon tan bskyed pa'i mdzod yin te //
K12D0834_H0798:442b-13: nga med bdag med mi dmigs la //
K12D0834_H0798:442b-14: su zhig de la nga rgyal bskyed //
K12D0834_H0798:442b-15: dpung bzhi'i tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i //
K12D0834_H0798:442b-16: shin tu rgyal ba'i khyu mchog 'grub //
K12D0834_H0798:442b-17: lha srin bdud sde tshar bcad pa'i //
K12D0834_H0798:442b-19: phrag dog yangs pa'i don sbyor ba //
K12D0834_H0798:442b-20: nga dang bdag med don rtogs na //
K12D0834_H0798:442b-21: dog dang yangs pa gnyis med de //
K12D0834_H0798:442b-23: phrag dog dngos po mi shes shing //
K12D0834_H0798:442b-24: nga dang bdag tu 'dzin gyur na //
K12D0834_H0798:442b-25: lha ma yin gyi gnas su skye //
K12D0834_H0798:442b-26: de nas yi dvags gnas su 'gro //
K12D0834_H0798:442b-27: gal te yul sa rnyed gyur na //
K12D0834_H0798:442b-28: shin tu mi bde dog par 'gyur //
K12D0834_H0798:442b-29: gzhan yang longs spyod thams cad la //
K12D0834_H0798:442b-30: dbang byar med cing gzhan dbang 'gyur //
K12D0834_H0798:442b-31: mdor na nyon mongs sdug bsngal 'grub //
K12D0834_H0798:442b-32: phrag dog yang dag rtogs pa ni //
K12D0834_H0798:442b-33: nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa dang //
K12D0834_H0798:442b-34: phyin ci log la phrag dog ste //
K12D0834_H0798:442b-35: thams cad gnyis su med par sbyor //
K12D0834_H0798:443a-2: gnyis med don yang rtogs par 'grub //
K12D0834_H0798:443a-3: nga med bdag med dbyings su thim //
K12D0834_H0798:443a-5: yid la lha ni rtag bsgoms na //
K12D0834_H0798:443a-6: rgyu 'bras lhun gyis grub pa yi //
K12D0834_H0798:443a-7: bdag gis kun tu dbang bsgyur te //
K12D0834_H0798:443a-9: rdo rje rigs kyis bsgrub bya ba //
K12D0834_H0798:443a-10: sgrol dang sbyor bas mthar phyin 'gyur //
K12D0834_H0798:443a-11: sbyor ba nyid ni sgrol ba yin //
K12D0834_H0798:443a-12: rang bzhin gyis ni sbyor sgrol dang //
K12D0834_H0798:443a-13: sgrol ba nyid ni sbyor ba yin //
K12D0834_H0798:443a-14: ting nge 'dzin gyis sbyor sgrol dang //
K12D0834_H0798:443a-15: dbang po'i yul dus sbyor sgrol dang //
K12D0834_H0798:443a-16: thabs chen dag gi sbyor sgrol dang //
K12D0834_H0798:443a-17: mngon du phyung ba'i sbyor sgrol lo //
K12D0834_H0798:443a-18: yang na sbyor sgrol bdag la sogs //
K12D0834_H0798:443a-19: shes rab dbyings dang bdag tu sbyor //

K12D0834_H0798:451a-31: thabs nyid shes rab ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni //
K12D0834_H0798:451b-0: ji ltar @451b snang ba thams cad kun //
K12D0834_H0798:451b-1: thams cad thabs kyi rang bzhin te //
K12D0834_H0798:451b-2: thabs la thabs ni rnam par sbyor //
K12D0834_H0798:451b-3: sbyor dang sbyor ba gnyi ga med //
K12D0834_H0798:451b-4: sna tshogs snang ba thams cad kyang //
K12D0834_H0798:451b-5: snang ba nyid na rang bzhin med; ;de nyid shes rab yin par bshad //
K12D0834_H0798:451b-6: rtag tu thabs nyid mi dmigs pa'o //
K12D0834_H0798:451b-7: shes rab nyid la thabs su sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
K12D0834_H0798:451b-8: de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid las //
K12D0834_H0798:451b-9: rol pa sna tshogs cir yang 'byung //
K12D0834_H0798:451b-10: 'byung ba nyid na rang bzhin med //
K12D0834_H0798:451b-11: med pa nyid na sna tshogs snang //
K12D0834_H0798:451b-12: thabs dang shes rab dbyings las byung //
K12D0834_H0798:451b-13: nyan bsam sgom pa'i shes rab kyis //
K12D0834_H0798:451b-14: shes rab thabs su don rtogs byos //
K12D0834_H0798:451b-15: kun la de ltar 'byor par gyis //
K12D0834_H0798:451b-16: gnyis med byang chub sems zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
K12D0834_H0798:451b-17: thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur na //
K12D0834_H0798:451b-18: gnyis med byang chub sems 'phros na //
K12D0834_H0798:451b-19: kun gyi 'byung gnas byed pa po //
K12D0834_H0798:451b-20: de yis ma byas gang yang min //
K12D0834_H0798:451b-21: kha dog dbyibs rigs gang yang min //
K12D0834_H0798:451b-22: shin tu brtag dka' sus mi rigs //
K12D0834_H0798:451b-23: bdag gis bdag kyang mi mthong na //
K12D0834_H0798:451b-24: gzhan gyis rtogs par ga la 'gyur //
K12D0834_H0798:451b-25: thams cad sbyor ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
K12D0834_H0798:451b-26: ye nas lha dang lha mo yin //
K12D0834_H0798:451b-27: dkyil 'khor yang dag sbyor ba dang //
K12D0834_H0798:451b-28: dbang po yul du sbyor ba'o //
K12D0834_H0798:451b-29: phung po lnga nyid de bzhin gshegs //
K12D0834_H0798:451b-30: 'byung ba lnga nyid yum du sbyor //
K12D0834_H0798:451b-31: dus bzhi'i lha mo nyid du sbyor //
K12D0834_H0798:451b-32: rtag chad mu bzhi'i khro mo 'o //
K12D0834_H0798:452a-2: mnyam pa'i dbyings dang rig par sbyor //
K12D0834_H0798:452a-3: yang na shes rab dbyings ma la //
K12D0834_H0798:452a-4: bde gshegs dkyil 'khor kun bkod la //
K12D0834_H0798:452a-5: bdag nyid rig pa'i lhar bsgoms ta //
K12D0834_H0798:452a-6: gnyis su med par ldan par bya //
K12D0834_H0798:452a-7: rdo rje dril bu ldan gyur nas //
K12D0834_H0798:452a-8: byang chub padma shin tu spro //
K12D0834_H0798:452a-9: phyogs dus dkyil 'khor mnyes pa dang //
K12D0834_H0798:452a-10: 'gro ba mang po bde thob nas //
K12D0834_H0798:452a-11: slar yang gnyis med dbyings su bstim //
K12D0834_H0798:452a-12: thim gyur dbyings nas phyag rgyar 'bar //
K12D0834_H0798:452a-13: bder gshegs thabs dang shes rab rdzogs //
K12D0834_H0798:452a-14: phyag rgya drug kyang yang dag rdzogs //
K12D0834_H0798:452a-15: bsod nams tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs //
K12D0834_H0798:452a-16: thams cad dbyings su 'byor pas na //
K12D0834_H0798:452a-18: 'di ni bsgral ba chen po yin //
K12D0834_H0798:452a-19: sgrol ba nyid ni sbyor ba yin //
K12D0834_H0798:452a-20: sbyor ba nyid ni ma lus bsgral //
K12D0834_H0798:452a-21: thams cad ma lus par sgrol byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
K12D0834_H0798:452a-22: phyi nang snod bcud ji snyed pa //
K12D0834_H0798:452a-23: gnas pa'i sems can ma lus kun //
K12D0834_H0798:452a-24: bdag nyid chen phor rtogs pa yis; ;dbyings su yang ni bsgral bar bya //
K12D0834_H0798:452a-25: shin tu khro bo chen po yis //
K12D0834_H0798:452a-26: thabs kyis lha chen bsgral ba ltar //
K12D0834_H0798:452a-27: chos nyid rtogs pa'i ting 'dzin gyis //
K12D0834_H0798:452a-28: gnyis su med par thabs kyis bsgral //
K12D0834_H0798:452a-29: thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis //
K12D0834_H0798:452a-30: lam lnga'i sems can kun bkug nas //
K12D0834_H0798:452a-31: thams cad ma lus bsgral bar bya //
K12D0834_H0798:452a-32: ri rab chen po'i gling bzhi la //
K12D0834_H0798:452b-0: gnas pa'i @452b sems can ma lus kun //
K12D0834_H0798:452b-1: thugs rje chen pos byin brlabs te //
K12D0834_H0798:452b-2: ye shes me chen bsgoms byas na //
K12D0834_H0798:452b-3: thams cad ma lus bsreg par bya //
K12D0834_H0798:452b-4: dbyings su yang ni bstims byas te //
K12D0834_H0798:452b-5: de bzhin gshegs par byin gyis brlab //
K12D0834_H0798:452b-6: rgyal ba'i sras su dbang yang bskur //
K12D0834_H0798:452b-7: de ltar bsgral bar kun byas kyang //
K12D0834_H0798:452b-8: bsgral ba'i dngos po gang yang med //
K12D0834_H0798:452b-9: phung po lnga po bshig pa la //
K12D0834_H0798:452b-10: bshig nas 'byung ba bag la zha //
K12D0834_H0798:452b-11: ma bshig na yang 'byung ba yin //
K12D0834_H0798:452b-12: rnam shes med pas bsad byas na //
K12D0834_H0798:452b-13: gnas pa nyid na dngos po med //
K12D0834_H0798:452b-14: sems kyi rang bzhin de la ni //
K12D0834_H0798:452b-15: dus gsum sangs rgyas dgrar langs kyang //
K12D0834_H0798:452b-16: sus kyang mi zin sod pa med //
K12D0834_H0798:452b-17: 'o na thugs rjes gang bsgral ba //
K12D0834_H0798:452b-18: rnam rtog mtshan ma thams cad kun //
K12D0834_H0798:452b-19: phyin ci log las bzlog byas te //
K12D0834_H0798:452b-20: ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgya dang //
K12D0834_H0798:452b-21: shin tu goms pas dbang bskur te //
K12D0834_H0798:452b-22: byang chub zhing la dgod par bya //
K12D0834_H0798:452b-23: de tsam la ni bsgral zhes gdags //
K12D0834_H0798:452b-24: bsgral ba nyid na sbyor ba yin //
K12D0834_H0798:452b-25: nyon mongs sdug bsngal rtsad bcad nas //
K12D0834_H0798:452b-26: byang chub gnas su bsgral bas na //
K12D0834_H0798:452b-27: gnyis med dbyings su sbyor ba yin //
K12D0834_H0798:452b-28: thabs nyid shes rab nyid thabs te //
K12D0834_H0798:452b-29: gnyis su med pa nyid byang chub kyi sems so //
K12D0834_H0798:452b-31: lha dang lha mor sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor dang //
K12D0834_H0798:452b-32: dbang po yul du sbyor ba dang /
K12D0834_H0798:452b-33: chen po lnga de bzhin gshegs pa lngar sbyor ba dang /
K12D0834_H0798:452b-34: so so rtsal sgyu ma tsam du yod pa yum du sbyor ba dang /
K12D0834_H0798:453a-1: lha dang lha mor sbyor ba dang /
K12D0834_H0798:453a-2: rtag chad mu bzhi khro bo khro mor sbyor ba dang /
K12D0834_H0798:453a-7: dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid du bsgral ba dang /
K12D0834_H0798:453a-8: thams cad ma lus par dbyings su dus gcig bsgral ba dang /
K12D0834_H0798:453a-9: thams cad thugs rje chen pos gnyis su med par sgrol ba'o //
K12D0834_H0798:453a-10: 'di gnyis dus gcig tu mdzad de /
K12D0834_H0798:453a-11: ya char ma gyur par bya'o //
K12D0834_H0798:453a-12: dngos grub mchog kyang der thob ces de bzhin gshegs
K12D0834_H0798:453a-13: pa nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bshad
K12D0834_H0798:453a-14: do // ma byin par len pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
K12D0834_H0798:453a-16: chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun //
K12D0834_H0798:453a-17: bdag dang bdag gi gzhan na med //
K12D0834_H0798:453a-18: rang bzhin rang gis bdag med pa //
K12D0834_H0798:453a-19: kun la thogs med spyad gyur kyang //
K12D0834_H0798:453a-20: spyad dang spyod pa gnyi ga med //
K12D0834_H0798:453a-21: thams cad ye nas stong pa la //
K12D0834_H0798:453a-22: gang gi len cing gang la spyod //
K12D0834_H0798:453a-23: snang srid ma lus thams cad la //
K12D0834_H0798:453a-24: thogs pa med pa'i spyod 'gyur yang //
K12D0834_H0798:453a-25: bcing bar mi 'gyur bsod nams tshogs //
K12D0834_H0798:453a-26: chags med ye shes chen po yin //
K12D0834_H0798:453a-27: ma lus thams cad chos kyi dbyings //
K12D0834_H0798:453a-28: de ltar rang rig yin par bshad //
K12D0834_H0798:453a-29: gnyis su med par rtogs gyur na //
K12D0834_H0798:453a-30: blangs pa nyid na kun tu bzang //
K12D0834_H0798:453b-0: brdzun du smra ba zhes bya @453b ba'i dam tshig ni /
K12D0834_H0798:453b-1: chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun //
K12D0834_H0798:453b-2: ye nas dngos po yod ma yin //
K12D0834_H0798:453b-3: rang rig ngang gis 'od gsal la //
K12D0834_H0798:453b-4: ming tsam tshig gis mtshon mod kyi //
K12D0834_H0798:453b-5: ming dang tshig la dngos po med //
K12D0834_H0798:453b-6: ma rig pa yi 'khrul rtog gis //
K12D0834_H0798:453b-7: nga dang bdag tu med pa la //
K12D0834_H0798:453b-8: so so mtshan ma dngos por bzung //
K12D0834_H0798:453b-9: 'dzin pa'i dngos po yong med de //
K12D0834_H0798:453b-10: chos rnams thams cad ming tshig tsam //
K12D0834_H0798:453b-11: ji snyed mang po brjod pa yang //
K12D0834_H0798:453b-12: rjod par byed dang brjod pa med //
K12D0834_H0798:453b-13: chos rnams thams cad rdzun du snang //
K12D0834_H0798:453b-14: rdzun nyid pa ni rdzun spyod de //
K12D0834_H0798:453b-15: rdzun zhes bya ba brtags pa cam //
K12D0834_H0798:453b-16: thams cad rdzun gyi tshig yin no //
K12D0834_H0798:453b-17: rdo rje 'joms byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
K12D0834_H0798:453b-18: thog ma med nas phyin ci log /
K12D0834_H0798:453b-19: bdag dang bdag gi med pa la //
K12D0834_H0798:453b-20: rnam rtog mtshan ma so sor 'dzin //
K12D0834_H0798:453b-21: 'dzin pa'i dngos po yod ma yin //
K12D0834_H0798:453b-22: mi mthun mtshan ma gzhom pa'i phyir //
K12D0834_H0798:453b-23: rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis //
K12D0834_H0798:453b-24: bdag rtog bag chags kun bcom nas //
K12D0834_H0798:453b-25: rdo rje dbyings su thim par bya; ;chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
K12D0834_H0798:453b-26: thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis //
K12D0834_H0798:453b-27: khams gsum nyon mongs 'khor ba rnams //
K12D0834_H0798:453b-28: gzhan gyis bcings te 'khor ba min //
K12D0834_H0798:453b-30: blo chen rab tu ldan pa yis //
K12D0834_H0798:453b-31: chos kyi don po mchog nyon la //
K12D0834_H0798:453b-32: 'khor ba spangs med sangs rgyas zhing //
K12D0834_H0798:454a-1: cad ma lus chos nyid rtogs //
K12D0834_H0798:454a-2: rin chen 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
K12D0834_H0798:454a-3: nor gyi mchog ni dkor bdun yin //
K12D0834_H0798:454a-4: 'dod pas btsal bas mi rnyed de //
K12D0834_H0798:454a-5: sku gsung thugs 'das mi dmigs pa'i //
K12D0834_H0798:454a-6: chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis ni //
K12D0834_H0798:454a-7: gnyis su med par 'byor byas na //
K12D0834_H0798:454a-9: mtshan dang dpe byad sna tshogs ldan //
K12D0834_H0798:454a-10: padma chags med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
K12D0834_H0798:454a-12: chos rnams ma lus thams cad la //
K12D0834_H0798:454a-13: sgo dang bsgo bar bya ba med //
K12D0834_H0798:454a-15: ji ltar snang ba mtha' yas kun //
K12D0834_H0798:454a-16: bdag las gud na gcig kyang med //
K12D0834_H0798:454a-17: bdag nyid shin tu mi dmigs pas //
K12D0834_H0798:454a-18: nyon mongs nyid kyang byang chub zhing //
K12D0834_H0798:454a-19: don rnams sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
K12D0834_H0798:454a-20: rdo rje rigs kyis thams cad bcom //
K12D0834_H0798:454a-21: rin chen rigs kyis yon tan 'byin //
K12D0834_H0798:454a-23: sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga //
K12D0834_H0798:454a-24: thams cad don rnams rdzogs par byas //
K12D0834_H0798:454a-25: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs te //
K12D0834_H0798:454a-26: mnyam pa'i dbyings la sems kyis blta //
K12D0834_H0798:454a-27: skye 'chi med par lhun gyis grub //
K12D0834_H0798:454a-28: sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang //
K12D0834_H0798:454a-29: 'phrin las rmad byung kun grags pa //
K12D0834_H0798:454a-30: gzhan na yod 'ong ma yin te //
K12D0834_H0798:454b-0: @454b rang byung ye shes gnas med yin //
K12D0834_H0798:454b-1: mthong ba'i tshul gyis gzugs snang dang //
K12D0834_H0798:454b-2: bla med byang chub skur snang ba //
K12D0834_H0798:454b-3: me long lta bu'i tshul bzhin du //
K12D0834_H0798:454b-4: sna tshogs kha dog dbyibs su snang //
K12D0834_H0798:454b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rnams ni /
K12D0834_H0798:454b-6: sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das //
K12D0834_H0798:454b-7: brjod med rang bzhin kun tu go /
K12D0834_H0798:454b-8: nyon mongs med cing bla med sgra //
K12D0834_H0798:454b-9: ma brjod stong gsum grags pa yi; ;gsung brjod bsam gyis mi khyab pa //
K12D0834_H0798:454b-10: brjod pa nyid na stong gsum med //
K12D0834_H0798:454b-11: de nyid sna tshogs brjod pa 'o //
K12D0834_H0798:454b-12: thams cad mkhyen pa'i thugs ldan pa //
K12D0834_H0798:454b-13: yang dag rtog pas rab brtags pa; ;gzhi rtsa med dbyings skad cig ma //
K12D0834_H0798:454b-14: mtha' dang dbus kyang brtag tu med //
K12D0834_H0798:454b-15: de nyid sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rgyu //
K12D0834_H0798:454b-16: sus kyang ma bcos ma byas pa //
K12D0834_H0798:454b-17: bdag gis bdag kyang dmigs mi 'gyur //
K12D0834_H0798:454b-18: dngos med kun la dbang sgyur ba //
K12D0834_H0798:454b-19: sku gsung yang dag ldan na //
K12D0834_H0798:454b-20: yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam //
K12D0834_H0798:454b-22: spyod yul ma lus thams cad la /
K12D0834_H0798:454b-24: mi zad pa yi gteng chen 'grub //
K12D0834_H0798:454b-25: gzhan gyis dbrog tu med pa yid //
K12D0834_H0798:454b-26: bo de'i dkor ni rin po che //
K12D0834_H0798:454b-27: thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis //
K12D0834_H0798:454b-28: bya byed med par rnam zhi mdzad //
K12D0834_H0798:454b-29: mdzad dang mdzad par bya ba med //
K12D0834_H0798:454b-30: ye nas lhun grub sangs rgyas chos //
K12D0834_H0798:454b-31: sgyu ma'i tshul du kun la spyod //
K12D0834_H0798:455a-1: la; ;chags med tshul du rnam par rol //
K12D0834_H0798:455a-2: bya byed rnam pa sna tshogs kyang //
K12D0834_H0798:455a-3: byed pa nyid na chu zla'i tshul //
K12D0834_H0798:455a-4: gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes ni //
K12D0834_H0798:455a-5: rtsa ba lnga zhes brjod mod kyi //
K12D0834_H0798:455a-6: brjod pa nyid na yong med de //
K12D0834_H0798:455a-7: mtshan nyid med pa sna tshogs snang //
K12D0834_H0798:455a-8: de nyid thams cad mkhyen nyid yin //
K12D0834_H0798:455a-9: kun la khyab cing mi gnas pa //
K12D0834_H0798:455a-10: de ni rig pa rang dbang 'gyur //
K12D0834_H0798:455a-11: sam gyis mi khyab kun tu khyab //
K12D0834_H0798:455a-12: nam mkha' snang byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
K12D0834_H0798:455a-13: chos rnams ma lus thams cad la //
K12D0834_H0798:455a-14: de bzhin nyid kyis kun tu khyab //
K12D0834_H0798:455a-15: snod bcud ma lus thams cad la //
K12D0834_H0798:455a-16: snang ba chen pos khyab par 'gyur //
K12D0834_H0798:455a-17: nam mkha' gzung du med pa ltar //
K12D0834_H0798:455a-18: snang srid thams cad de dang 'dra //
K12D0834_H0798:455a-19: chos rnams thams cad sems yin te //
K12D0834_H0798:455a-20: sems ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin no //
K12D0834_H0798:455a-21: rten byed sa chen zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
K12D0834_H0798:455a-22: ji ltar sa gzhi chen po la //
K12D0834_H0798:455a-23: sems kyis zin dang ma zin pa'i //
K12D0834_H0798:455a-25: thams cad kun gyi gnas rten te; ;de bzhin theg chen bla med la //
K12D0834_H0798:455a-26: byang chub sangs rgyas kun gnas //
K12D0834_H0798:455a-27: theg pa mtho dman thams cad 'byung //
K12D0834_H0798:455a-28: thams cad theg chen dbyings su 'dus //
K12D0834_H0798:455a-29: sreg byed ye shes me zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
K12D0834_H0798:455a-30: bdag med ye shes rang rig gis //
K12D0834_H0798:455a-31: dngos dang dngos med bar phyogs bsregs //
K12D0834_H0798:455a-32: rang dang spyi yi chos rnams dang //
K12D0834_H0798:455b-0: sems kyi phrag dog thams cad @455b kun; ;dngos po med par rtogs byas na //
K12D0834_H0798:455b-1: 'khor ba ma spangs rnam par dag /
K12D0834_H0798:455b-2: mya ngan mi 'da' ye nas gnas //
K12D0834_H0798:455b-3: 'gro dang gnas par bya ba min //
K12D0834_H0798:455b-4: rtog pa thams cad ye nas tshogs //
K12D0834_H0798:455b-5: thams cad 'khru byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
K12D0834_H0798:455b-6: sems can ma lus thams cad ni //
K12D0834_H0798:455b-8: nyan bsam sgom pa'i shes rab kyis //
K12D0834_H0798:455b-9: bdag med gnyis ni rtogs byas na; ;pha rol phyin rdzogs sa bcu bsgrubs //
K12D0834_H0798:455b-10: sa gsum yang dag rdzogs byas te //
