K12D0834_H0798:463b-27: kun rdzob bya ba sna tshogs byed //
K12D0834_H0798:463b-28: bde ba'i yul dang mi bde'i yul //
K12D0834_H0798:463b-29: so so'i ro rnams myong byed cing //
K12D0834_H0798:463b-30: lnga po'i mtshan nyid bshig byas nas //
K12D0834_H0798:463b-31: so so'i mtshan nyid dngos po med //
K12D0834_H0798:463b-32: gang gis de la dngos bzung na //
K12D0834_H0798:463b-33: ngan song gsum du skye bar 'gyur //
K12D0834_H0798:464a-2: snang ba nyid ni rang bzhin med //
K12D0834_H0798:464a-3: snang med de nyid sna tshogs ston //
K12D0834_H0798:464a-4: snang dang mi snang gnyis su med //
K12D0834_H0798:464a-5: de rtogs rnam par thar pa'i gnas //
K12D0834_H0798:464a-6: gzugs nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku //
K12D0834_H0798:464a-7: tshor ba'i mtshan nyid brjod pa ni //
K12D0834_H0798:464a-8: kun la rnam gsum 'byung mod kyi //
K12D0834_H0798:464a-9: bde dang mi bde dngos po med //
K12D0834_H0798:464a-10: gnyi ga ma yin lung ma bstan //
K12D0834_H0798:464a-12: tshor dang 'byung ba gnyi ga stong //
K12D0834_H0798:464a-13: stong nyid dngos po yod ma yin //
K12D0834_H0798:464a-14: de rtogs chos kyi go bgos yin //
K12D0834_H0798:464a-15: 'du shes mtshan nyid bshad pa ni //
K12D0834_H0798:464a-16: gsum tshogs mtshan mar 'dzin pa yin //
K12D0834_H0798:464a-17: so so mtshan nyid bshig pa na //
K12D0834_H0798:464a-18: dngos po med de de bzhin nyid //
K12D0834_H0798:464a-19: dngos po de ni sna tshogs pa //
K12D0834_H0798:464a-20: bya byed med par kun tu 'jug /
K12D0834_H0798:464a-21: khams gsum ma lus thams cad la //
K12D0834_H0798:464a-22: mtshan ma che chung bsam mi khyab //
K12D0834_H0798:464a-23: khyab med dngos po yod ma yin //
K12D0834_H0798:464a-24: de ltar rtogs na sangs rgyas mtshan //
K12D0834_H0798:464a-26: rtsa ba brgyad pa'i grangs 'gyur te //
K12D0834_H0798:464a-27: lnga bcu rtsa gcig kun la 'pho //
K12D0834_H0798:464a-28: der rtogs rtsa ba yod ma yin //
K12D0834_H0798:464a-29: med bzhin log g-yo rnam par 'byung //
K12D0834_H0798:464a-30: de la dngos por 'dzin pa ni //
K12D0834_H0798:464a-31: rtag tu nyon mongs g-yengs gyur nas //
K12D0834_H0798:464a-32: khams gsum brtson ra kun tu 'khor //
K12D0834_H0798:464a-33: yang dag don phyir rig pas ni //
K12D0834_H0798:464a-34: 'phro ba'i gzhi rtsa de bzhin de //
K12D0834_H0798:464a-35: de la rnam rig 'byung ba ni //
K12D0834_H0798:464b-0: dngos @464b po med de skad cig ma //
K12D0834_H0798:464b-1: ye shes dbyings la rol pa mdzad //
K12D0834_H0798:464b-2: sprul pa'i tshogs chen yin par bshad //
K12D0834_H0798:464b-3: kun gyi 'byung gnas rnam shes te //
K12D0834_H0798:464b-4: de yi dngos po'i rang bzhin ni //
K12D0834_H0798:464b-5: kha dog dbyibs dang rig rgyun min //
K12D0834_H0798:464b-6: gang yang ma yin nyid mi dmigs //
K12D0834_H0798:464b-7: 'di ni kun la dbang bsgyur te //
K12D0834_H0798:464b-9: rtogs dang ma rtogs khyad par ro //
K12D0834_H0798:464b-10: bzhi po mnyam pa'i ngang shes na; ;'di ni ye shes chen po yin //
K12D0834_H0798:464b-11: kha dog lnga yi dam tshig ni //
K12D0834_H0798:464b-12: sems can ma lus thams cad la //
K12D0834_H0798:464b-13: ye shes lnga yis kun khyab kyang //
K12D0834_H0798:464b-14: rang gi rnam rtog bsgribs byas te //
K12D0834_H0798:464b-15: ye shes lnga yi don ma mthong //
K12D0834_H0798:464b-16: ma mthong rmongs pa thams cad la //
K12D0834_H0798:464b-17: ye shes mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir //
K12D0834_H0798:464b-18: dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang //
K12D0834_H0798:464b-19: ljang gu la sogs nag por bstan //
K12D0834_H0798:464b-20: chos rnams bdag med rtogs byas nas //
K12D0834_H0798:464b-21: byang chub sems nyid dag pa'i phyir //
K12D0834_H0798:464b-22: shin tu mdog ni dkar bstan pa //
K12D0834_H0798:464b-23: de rtogs bya phyir dag pa'i mdog /
K12D0834_H0798:464b-24: chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun //
K12D0834_H0798:464b-25: padma r'a ga zhes brjod do //
K12D0834_H0798:464b-26: chags dang chags par bya ba med //
K12D0834_H0798:464b-27: chags med phyir yang dmar po'o //
K12D0834_H0798:464b-28: yon tan gter chen zad mi she pa //
K12D0834_H0798:464b-29: thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas yin te //
K12D0834_H0798:464b-30: de bzhin nyid dbyings ma lus la; ;zad med rin chen gter 'gyur ba //
K12D0834_H0798:464b-31: mdog ni gser gyi mdog tu bstan //
K12D0834_H0798:464b-32: chos rnams phyin ci log rnams la //
K12D0834_H0798:464b-33: thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis //
K12D0834_H0798:465a-2: las rnams ma lus rdzogs par byed //
K12D0834_H0798:465a-3: kun tu las ni ljang gu'i mdog /
K12D0834_H0798:465a-4: de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid las //
K12D0834_H0798:465a-5: cis kyang mi tshugs bcos su med; ;kha dog nag po dngos po la //
K12D0834_H0798:465a-6: tshon gzhan dag gis bsgyur du med //
K12D0834_H0798:465a-7: de bzhin kun la shes par byos //
K12D0834_H0798:465a-8: phyogs lnga zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni //
K12D0834_H0798:465a-9: mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin du; ;dbyer med ngang du gnas pa la //
K12D0834_H0798:465a-10: ye shes rtogs pa'i don bya phyir //
K12D0834_H0798:465a-11: phyogs dang dbus su gnas par bya //
K12D0834_H0798:465a-12: sems can ma rig ldongs pa la //
K12D0834_H0798:465a-13: nyon mongs ma rig bsal bya'i phyir; ;ye shes sgron ma 'od 'bar bas //
K12D0834_H0798:465a-14: ma rig mun pa sel bar byed //
K12D0834_H0798:465a-15: de phyir de la shar zhes bya //
K12D0834_H0798:465a-16: sems can ma lus thams cad la //
K12D0834_H0798:465a-17: nyon mongs sdug bsngal mi gnas shing //
K12D0834_H0798:465a-18: ma rig mun pa nub 'gyur bas //
K12D0834_H0798:465a-19: de la nub kyi phyogs zhes bya //
K12D0834_H0798:465a-20: sems can kun gyi nyon mongs kun //
K12D0834_H0798:465a-21: ye shes chen po bdag med pas //
K12D0834_H0798:465a-22: sdug bsngal rab tu byang byas nas //
K12D0834_H0798:465a-23: de la byang gi phyogs zhes brjod //
K12D0834_H0798:465a-24: de ltar ma lus thams cad la //
K12D0834_H0798:465a-25: thugs rje shar dang sgrib pa nub //
K12D0834_H0798:465a-26: rnam rtog mtshan nyid byang gyur na //
K12D0834_H0798:465a-27: de yi yon tan chen po rdzogs //
K12D0834_H0798:465a-28: de ltar chos rnams ma lus kun //
K12D0834_H0798:465a-29: rang bzhin nyid kyi dbyings su 'dus //
K12D0834_H0798:465a-30: phyogs rnams ma lus thams cad kun //
K12D0834_H0798:465a-31: de bzhin nyid du zlum pa'i tshul //
K12D0834_H0798:465a-32: phyogs rnams kun la de ltar blta //
K12D0834_H0798:465b-0: ma rig @465b phyin ci log rnams kyis //
K12D0834_H0798:465b-1: phyogs rnams so sor gzung gyur na //
K12D0834_H0798:465b-3: dbang po lnga zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni //
K12D0834_H0798:465b-4: yul lnga dag la dbang byed cing //
K12D0834_H0798:465b-5: phyin ci log ni dngos por 'dzin //
K12D0834_H0798:465b-6: dngos por bzung bas khams gsum 'khor //
K12D0834_H0798:465b-7: gzugs rnams ma lus thams cad la //
K12D0834_H0798:465b-8: snang zhing dngos po med pa dang //
K12D0834_H0798:465b-9: lha dang lha mo'i dngos por brtags //
K12D0834_H0798:465b-10: bdag dang lha nyid gnyis pa'o //
K12D0834_H0798:465b-11: sgra rnams sna tshogs grags pa yang //
K12D0834_H0798:465b-12: sgra nyid dngos po med par shes //
K12D0834_H0798:465b-13: sgra brjod ma lus thams cad ni //
K12D0834_H0798:465b-14: chos kyi sgra chen sna tshogs yin //
K12D0834_H0798:465b-15: dri yi dngos por snang ba yang; ;dri nyid rang bzhin gang yang med //
K12D0834_H0798:465b-16: dri snom chos kyi dri yin te //
K12D0834_H0798:465b-17: shes rab chen pos de ltar rtogs //
K12D0834_H0798:465b-18: ro yi dngos po snang ba yang //
K12D0834_H0798:465b-19: ro yi rang bzhin yod ma yin //
K12D0834_H0798:465b-20: ro bro de bzhin nyid kyi ro //
K12D0834_H0798:465b-21: bde ba de yis tshim par byed //
K12D0834_H0798:465b-22: reg bya sna tshogs snang ba yang //
K12D0834_H0798:465b-23: reg bya'i dngos po yod med de //
K12D0834_H0798:465b-24: reg byar snang ba longs spyod yin //
K12D0834_H0798:465b-25: bde ba chen po chos kyi sku //
K12D0834_H0798:465b-26: mi shes phyin ci log rnams kyis //
K12D0834_H0798:465b-27: dbang po yul la chags gyur na //
K12D0834_H0798:465b-29: ngan song gsum dang mi khom brgyad //
K12D0834_H0798:465b-30: rtsa ba sog ma'i me bzhin du //
K12D0834_H0798:465b-32: de bas ye shes chags med rtogs //
K12D0834_H0798:465b-33: byas la mi gsog bsod nams byos //
K12D0834_H0798:465b-34: kun la spyod cing mi gos pas //
K12D0834_H0798:465b-35: ye shes chen po rtag tu sgoms //
K12D0834_H0798:466a-1: zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
K12D0834_H0798:466a-2: don dam par skye ba med par mnyam pa dang //
K12D0834_H0798:466a-3: kun rdzob sgyu mar mnyam pa dang /
K12D0834_H0798:466a-4: don dam pa dang kun rdzob tu dbyer med par
K12D0834_H0798:466a-5: mnyam pa dang; chen po lnga de bzhin gshegs pa
K12D0834_H0798:466a-7: rnam par shes pa brgyad ye shes lngar mnyam pa'o //
K12D0834_H0798:466a-8: de la don dam par skye ba med par mnyam pa ni /
K12D0834_H0798:466a-9: chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun //
K12D0834_H0798:466a-10: de bzhin nyid dang stong pa'i mtha'//
K12D0834_H0798:466a-11: yang dag pa dang chos kyi dbyings //
K12D0834_H0798:466a-12: mtshan nyid med cing dmigs su med //
K12D0834_H0798:466a-13: gzung du med cing smon pa med //
K12D0834_H0798:466a-14: ye nas mya ngan 'das pa yin //
K12D0834_H0798:466a-15: thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
K12D0834_H0798:466a-16: nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med //
K12D0834_H0798:466a-17: kun rdzob sgyu mar mnyam pa dang //
K12D0834_H0798:466a-18: 'dus byas dngos po sna tshogs ni //
K12D0834_H0798:466a-19: sgyu ma'i tshul du thams cad snang //
K12D0834_H0798:466a-20: 'phral gyi bya ba kun kyang byed //
K12D0834_H0798:466a-21: rtog pa kun gyi mtshan ma snang //
K12D0834_H0798:466a-22: 'di dag thams cad gzugs brnyan te //
K12D0834_H0798:466a-23: bya byed snang zhing dngos po med //
K12D0834_H0798:466a-24: chu zla'i tshul du thams cad gnas //
K12D0834_H0798:466a-25: thams cad snang la rang bzhin med //
K12D0834_H0798:466a-26: don dam kun rdzob dbyer med na //
K12D0834_H0798:466a-27: chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun //
K12D0834_H0798:466a-28: gzhi rtsa med las thams cad 'byung //
K12D0834_H0798:466a-29: yod dang med pa gnyi ga min //
K12D0834_H0798:466a-30: don dam kun rdzob dbyer med de //
K12D0834_H0798:466a-32: snang ba nyid na dngos po med //
K12D0834_H0798:466a-33: dngos med de nyid sna tshogs te //
K12D0834_H0798:466a-34: de nyid sgyu ma mig yor tshul //
K12D0834_H0798:466b-0: @466b 'byung ba chen po lnga de bzhin gshegs pa lngar mnyam pa ni //
K12D0834_H0798:466b-1: sa chu me rlung nam mkha' las //
K12D0834_H0798:466b-3: gzhi rtsa yod pa ma yin te //
K12D0834_H0798:466b-4: rang bzhin ngang gis de ltar 'byung //
K12D0834_H0798:466b-5: so so'i rigs tshogs snang ba ni //
K12D0834_H0798:466b-6: thabs chen dag tu rtag tu mnyam //
K12D0834_H0798:466b-7: mtshan nyid so sor gnas pa ni //
K12D0834_H0798:466b-8: shes rab dbyings kyi ngang du mnyam //
K12D0834_H0798:466b-9: rnam par shes pa brgyad ye shes lngar mnyam pa ni /
K12D0834_H0798:466b-10: rnam rtog kun gzhi ma yin pa //
K12D0834_H0798:466b-11: rang bzhin med pa don gyi gzhi //
K12D0834_H0798:466b-12: 'di ni chos kyi dbyings zhes bya //
K12D0834_H0798:466b-13: de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes so //
K12D0834_H0798:466b-14: chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun //
K12D0834_H0798:466b-15: nga dang bdag tu mi 'dzin cing //
K12D0834_H0798:466b-16: kun kyang dbyer med pa yin pas //
K12D0834_H0798:466b-17: thams cad me long lta bu'i tshul //
K12D0834_H0798:466b-18: thams cad kun la yud rtog cing //
K12D0834_H0798:466b-19: rtog dang brtag par bya ba med //
K12D0834_H0798:466b-20: dus gsum kun tu mi dmigs pa //
K12D0834_H0798:466b-21: 'di ni mnyam nyid ye shes yin //
K12D0834_H0798:466b-22: log rtog dbang po'i spyod yul spangs //
K12D0834_H0798:466b-23: dbang po'i yul rnams dngos med par //
K12D0834_H0798:466b-24: thams cad dbyer med de bzhin nyid //
K12D0834_H0798:466b-25: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes yin //
K12D0834_H0798:466b-26: mnyam pa rnam lnga de ltar brtags //
K12D0834_H0798:466b-27: chos rnams ma lus thams cad la //
K12D0834_H0798:466b-28: ye nas rang bzhin med pa dang //
K12D0834_H0798:466b-29: thabs chen lhun gyis grub par brtags //
K12D0834_H0798:466b-30: 'di ni yang dag rtogs pa yin //
K12D0834_H0798:466b-31: tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni //
K12D0834_H0798:466b-32: bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs te //
K12D0834_H0798:466b-33: rang rig mtha' dbus med pa'i dkyil //
K12D0834_H0798:467a-2: yang na rdo rje sems dpa' nyid //
K12D0834_H0798:467a-3: rigs bzhi'i lha dang lha mo dang //
K12D0834_H0798:467a-4: 'khor gyi khro bo khro mo dang //
K12D0834_H0798:467a-5: yang na 'das pa'i dkyil nyid de //
K12D0834_H0798:467a-7: tshogs kyi mchod pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni //
K12D0834_H0798:467a-8: thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur cing //
K12D0834_H0798:467a-9: byang chub sems dang ma chags pa'i //
K12D0834_H0798:467a-10: gnyis su med par thim gyur na //
K12D0834_H0798:467a-11: tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par ldan //
K12D0834_H0798:467a-12: 'dod yon lnga po thams cad dang //
K12D0834_H0798:467a-13: sna tshogs snang ba thams cad kun //
K12D0834_H0798:467a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang //
K12D0834_H0798:467a-15: gzugs mdzes lha dang lha mor brtags //
K12D0834_H0798:467a-16: thams cad ma lus sgra rnams ni //
K12D0834_H0798:467a-17: chos kyi sgra chen yin pa dang //
K12D0834_H0798:467a-18: ngan song sbyong zhing thar lam ston //
K12D0834_H0798:467a-19: stong gsum grags pa'i sgra chen dang //
K12D0834_H0798:467a-20: thams cad 'jal ba'i sgra yang yin //
K12D0834_H0798:467a-21: bde ba tshim byed bsod nams te //
K12D0834_H0798:467a-22: brjod med mi gnas ye shes yin //
K12D0834_H0798:467a-24: chos nyid dngos po med pa la //
K12D0834_H0798:467a-25: dri yis mchog tu tshim byed pa; ;bsod nams tshogs chen yin par bshad //
K12D0834_H0798:467a-26: chags med ye shes tshul yin te //
K12D0834_H0798:467a-27: de bzhin dri yis mnyes mchod na //
K12D0834_H0798:467a-29: ngan song gsum du chos kyi de //
K12D0834_H0798:467a-30: kun tu bde gnas thob par byed //
K12D0834_H0798:467a-31: bder gshegs dkyil 'khor ma lus pa //
K12D0834_H0798:467a-32: bde ba'i ro yis mchod par 'gyur //
K12D0834_H0798:467a-33: tshim byed bsod nams tshogs chen 'gyur //
K12D0834_H0798:467b-0: dngos @467b por mi 'dzin bsod nams tshogs //
K12D0834_H0798:467b-1: de lta bu yi ro mchog gis //
K12D0834_H0798:467b-2: thams cad kun la tshim par 'gyur //
K12D0834_H0798:467b-3: yi dvags gnas su longs spyod ldan //
K12D0834_H0798:467b-4: dkyil 'khor ma lus mchod pa yin //
K12D0834_H0798:467b-5: bde ba chen po rdzogs pa'o //
K12D0834_H0798:467b-6: rnal 'byor las su rung rnams kyis //
K12D0834_H0798:467b-7: rnam pa mang pos brgyan pa dang //
K12D0834_H0798:467b-8: sbyor mchod dag gis longs spyod na //
K12D0834_H0798:467b-11: sdig pa'i mun nag sel bar byed //
K12D0834_H0798:467b-12: dpung gi tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i //
K12D0834_H0798:467b-13: mthu chen dag kyang 'grub par byed //
K12D0834_H0798:467b-14: tshogs kyi 'phrin las zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni //
K12D0834_H0798:467b-15: byed pa med pa'i tshul gyis ni //
K12D0834_H0798:467b-16: kun la thogs pa med par spyad //
K12D0834_H0798:467b-17: thams cad ma lus 'dul bar byed //
K12D0834_H0798:467b-18: mi mthun phyogs nas dbang du byed //
K12D0834_H0798:467b-19: yon tan chen po 'phel bar byed; ;khro bo gtum po'ang zhi bar byed //
K12D0834_H0798:467b-20: thams cad kun la spyad bde ba //
K12D0834_H0798:467b-21: chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas //
K12D0834_H0798:467b-22: dbyings su bsdus pas dkyil yin te //
K12D0834_H0798:467b-24: mnyam pa chen po'i ngang nyid ni //
K12D0834_H0798:467b-25: de lta bu yi tshul du gnas //
K12D0834_H0798:467b-26: 'khor gyi phra men tshim par byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni /
K12D0834_H0798:467b-27: bdag nyid 'dul ba'i dbang phyug tu //
K12D0834_H0798:467b-28: rtag tu mnyam ba zhag khro bo'i tshul //
K12D0834_H0798:467b-29: 'khor gyi khro rnams de bzhin te //
K12D0834_H0798:467b-30: mdog dang phyag rgya thams cad dang //
K12D0834_H0798:467b-31: sngags mchog dam pa ma lus 'don //
K12D0834_H0798:468a-1: nas; ;so so'i las dang mthun byas te //
K12D0834_H0798:468a-2: so so'i gnas su gzhag par bya //
K12D0834_H0798:468a-3: dbang du bsdu dang sgom pa'i thabs //
K12D0834_H0798:468a-4: ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du bya //
K12D0834_H0798:468a-5: ma lus thams cad byos shig par //
K12D0834_H0798:468a-6: lhag ma byin nas dbang yang bskur //
K12D0834_H0798:468a-7: gzhan yang 'gro ba thams cad la //
K12D0834_H0798:468a-8: 'dod yon lnga yi sbyin ba gtang //
K12D0834_H0798:468a-9: de nas las rnams rdzogs byas nas //
K12D0834_H0798:468a-10: dbang phyug chen po'i gnas brtan nas //
K12D0834_H0798:468a-11: rigs lnga ye shes lnga la sogs //
K12D0834_H0798:468a-13: bdag la thams cad bsdu bar bya //
K12D0834_H0798:468a-14: de ltar sgrub pa'i ngang 'chang ba //
K12D0834_H0798:468a-15: ye shes tshogs gnyis rdzogs byas nas //
K12D0834_H0798:468a-16: rig 'dzin rig pa'i sa la gnas //
K12D0834_H0798:468a-17: theg dman spyod par yong mi 'gyur //
K12D0834_H0798:468a-18: mi khom gnas su skye mi 'gyur //
K12D0834_H0798:468a-19: skye shi med pa'i g-yung drung thob //
K12D0834_H0798:468a-20: sangs rgyas zhing yang sbyong bar byed //
K12D0834_H0798:468a-21: ngan song gnas rnams stong par byed //
K12D0834_H0798:468a-22: yang dag mchog gi snying po 'grub //
K12D0834_H0798:468a-23: dbang po yul du snang ba kun //
K12D0834_H0798:468a-24: yul rnams yod pa ma yin te //
K12D0834_H0798:468a-25: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa nyid //
K12D0834_H0798:468a-26: dngos po sna tshogs par snang ste //
K12D0834_H0798:468a-27: snang ba'i dngos po rnams shig na //
K12D0834_H0798:468a-28: so so'i mtshan nyid rnam bshig nas //
K12D0834_H0798:468a-29: gzhigs na nam mkha'i ngang du zhi //
K12D0834_H0798:468a-30: nam mkha' de nyid lngas gzhigs na //
K12D0834_H0798:468a-31: mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyings su thim //
K12D0834_H0798:468a-32: thams cad kun gyi 'byung gnas so //
K12D0834_H0798:468a-33: gzhi rtsa med pa'i skad cig ma //
K12D0834_H0798:468a-34: snang ba mi 'gog thabs yin te //
K12D0834_H0798:468b-0: rang bzhin @468b med pa shes rab nyid //
K12D0834_H0798:468b-1: nyon mongs rnam par shes pa ni //
K12D0834_H0798:468b-2: kun gzhi nyid snang spyod yul la //
K12D0834_H0798:468b-3: de dang bdag tu rnam par rtog //
K12D0834_H0798:468b-4: bde sdug mtshan ma so sor 'dzin //
K12D0834_H0798:468b-5: kun gzhi dngos po med pa la; ;bag chags gsog pa'i gnas med de //
K12D0834_H0798:468b-6: snang ba'i dngos po med pa la //
K12D0834_H0798:468b-7: nyon mongs blo yis blang du med //
K12D0834_H0798:468b-8: sgo dang bsgo bar bya ba med //
K12D0834_H0798:468b-9: de ltar sgo byed dngos po med //
K12D0834_H0798:468b-10: med bzhin sems kyis log brtags pa //
K12D0834_H0798:468b-11: khams gsum brtson rar rtag tu 'khor //
K12D0834_H0798:468b-12: yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni //
K12D0834_H0798:468b-13: snang dang mi snang gnyi ga la //
K12D0834_H0798:468b-14: skad cig yud tsam rtog pa yin //
K12D0834_H0798:468b-15: rtog pa nyid kyang ma grub na //
K12D0834_H0798:468b-16: yul gyi dngos po ga la 'grub //
K12D0834_H0798:468b-17: yid kyi de bzhin rgyun nyid ni //
K12D0834_H0798:468b-18: snga ma 'das shing mi dmigs pa //
K12D0834_H0798:468b-19: phyi ma ma byung brtag tu med //
K12D0834_H0798:468b-20: de ltar rang bzhin dmigs su med; ;rtsi shing kha na rlung 'phyo 'dra //
K12D0834_H0798:468b-21: rgyud ni yongs su ma chad pa //
K12D0834_H0798:468b-23: de ltar don rnams dngos po med //
K12D0834_H0798:468b-24: chu dang rlung dang rlabs 'dra ba //
K12D0834_H0798:468b-25: de gsum gcig dang so so min //
K12D0834_H0798:468b-26: de bzhin kun gzhi nyon mongs yid //
K12D0834_H0798:468b-27: gcig pa ma yin so so min //
K12D0834_H0798:468b-28: chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i dbyings //
K12D0834_H0798:468b-29: thams cad ye shes dbyer med cing //
K12D0834_H0798:468b-30: gcig tu yang ni brjod pa med; ;de ltar ma rtogs sems can yin //
K12D0834_H0798:468b-31: rtogs na sangs rgyas gud na med //
K12D0834_H0798:468b-32: byang chub sems kyi de bzhin ni //
K12D0834_H0798:468b-33: shin tu mi dmigs brtag dka' ba //
K12D0834_H0798:469a-2: shes rab zab pas rtogs 'gyur te //
K12D0834_H0798:469a-5: shin tu brtag dka' mi dmigs pa; ;mtha' dang dbus kyang brtag tu med //
K12D0834_H0798:469a-6: gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ngang nyid ni //
K12D0834_H0798:469a-7: dmigs med tshul du de ltar snang //
K12D0834_H0798:469a-8: dbyings dang dbyings kyi ye shes kyang //
K12D0834_H0798:469a-9: rang rig kho na tsam du zad; ;sems can ma lus thams cad kyi //
K12D0834_H0798:469a-10: de ltar khong du chud par byos //
K12D0834_H0798:469a-11: nyon mongs sdug bsngal med pa dang //
K12D0834_H0798:469a-13: sems can ma lus thams cad la //
K12D0834_H0798:469a-14: snying rje'i theg pa ma chags par //
K12D0834_H0798:469a-15: nyon mongs lam las grol byed cing //
K12D0834_H0798:469a-16: byams pa dag gis mnyes par gyis //
K12D0834_H0798:469a-17: de bzhin 'khor ba'i btson ra la //
K12D0834_H0798:469a-18: snying rje'i zhags pa cher brkyangs nas //
K12D0834_H0798:469a-20: snying rje chen po skye ma byed //
K12D0834_H0798:469a-21: de bzhin skye bo phal rnams la //
K12D0834_H0798:469a-22: las kyi sgrib pas mi gos shing //
K12D0834_H0798:469a-23: thams cad mngon par sangs rgyas par //
K12D0834_H0798:469a-25: sems can nga dang bdag med la //
K12D0834_H0798:469a-26: thugs rjes gnyis rtog mi 'byed de //
K12D0834_H0798:469a-27: bu gcig 'dra bar blo gzhag bya //
K12D0834_H0798:469a-28: thams cad dri ma med par bya //
K12D0834_H0798:469a-29: chos rnams thams cad stong pa bas //
K12D0834_H0798:469a-30: de la dngos dang rtog pa med //
K12D0834_H0798:469a-31: nam mkha'i ngang du gnas pa la //
K12D0834_H0798:469a-32: de la bcos shing bsgyur du med //
K12D0834_H0798:469b-0: chos rnams thams @469b cad mtshan nyid med //
K12D0834_H0798:469b-1: snang ba thams cad dngos med pas //
K12D0834_H0798:469b-2: yod dang med pa thams cad kun //
K12D0834_H0798:469b-3: mtshan nyid med pas mi dmigs so //
K12D0834_H0798:469b-5: chos rnams sna tshogs snang ba dang //
K12D0834_H0798:469b-6: bdag las gzhan pa ma yin pas //
K12D0834_H0798:469b-7: kun la smon cing chags su med //
K12D0834_H0798:469b-8: byang chub sems rnams thams cad ni //
K12D0834_H0798:469b-9: shin tu brtag dka' gting zab pas //
K12D0834_H0798:469b-10: rtog ge'i spyod yul de ma yin //
K12D0834_H0798:469b-11: ma dmigs mi dmigs dmigs su med //
K12D0834_H0798:469b-12: sems nyid de nyid ji lta bu //
K12D0834_H0798:469b-13: byang chub de nyid sems yin no //
K12D0834_H0798:469b-14: sems dang byang chub dbyer med pas //
K12D0834_H0798:469b-15: sems can ma lus thams cad dang //
K12D0834_H0798:469b-16: dus gsum chos rnams thams cad yin //
K12D0834_H0798:469b-17: thams cad ma lus chos so cog /
K12D0834_H0798:469b-18: sems dang byang chub nyid du 'ubs //
K12D0834_H0798:469b-19: bo dhi chen pos de skad bshad //
K12D0834_H0798:469b-20: skyes bu blo rtsal rab ldan pas //
K12D0834_H0798:469b-21: ci la'ang thogs pa med par spyad //
K12D0834_H0798:469b-22: spyad pa nyid na chags pa med //
K12D0834_H0798:469b-23: dus mtha' med par ma nyams gnas //
K12D0834_H0798:469b-24: 'di ltar snang ba thams cad la //
K12D0834_H0798:469b-25: mngon sum tshad mas rtag mthong yang //
K12D0834_H0798:469b-26: snang ba nyid na dngos po med //
K12D0834_H0798:469b-27: de bzhin yang dag nyid du rtogs //
K12D0834_H0798:469b-28: gang zhig stong pa'i ngang yod ces //
K12D0834_H0798:469b-29: med pa'i rang bzhin rtogs pa de //
K12D0834_H0798:469b-30: ri bong rva dang mo gsham bu //
K12D0834_H0798:469b-31: tshig tsam gdags su rung mod kyi //
K12D0834_H0798:469b-32: thams cad ming tsam stong nyid med //
K12D0834_H0798:469b-33: thams cad ma lus stong zhes te /
K12D0834_H0798:469b-34: dran med brdos pa ma yin pas //
K12D0834_H0798:470a-2: 'di ltar snang ba thams cad kun //
K12D0834_H0798:470a-3: brdos pa tsam gyi chos med do //
K12D0834_H0798:470a-5: thams cad gnyis med rtogs gyur na //
K12D0834_H0798:470a-6: de nyid don dam dbyings yin te //
K12D0834_H0798:470a-7: gzhan nas btsal zhing gzhag tu med //
K12D0834_H0798:470a-8: yod las btsal na sgro btags 'gyur //
K12D0834_H0798:470a-9: med las btsal na skur btab ste //
K12D0834_H0798:470a-10: yod med gnyis las btsal byas na //
K12D0834_H0798:470a-11: de ni lung du ma bstan 'gyur //
K12D0834_H0798:470a-12: rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' ste //
K12D0834_H0798:470a-13: de yis mi mkhyen ci yang med //
K12D0834_H0798:470a-14: rnal 'byor lta ba de lta bu //
K12D0834_H0798:470a-15: tshig gis snga phyi yod mod kyang //
K12D0834_H0798:470a-16: don gyis gcig car rdzogs par bsgom //
K12D0834_H0798:470a-17: de lta bu yi don rtogs kyang //
K12D0834_H0798:470a-19: theg chen sgom las nyams pa mid //
K12D0834_H0798:470a-20: gong gi don ltar ma rtogs pa'i //
K12D0834_H0798:470a-21: blo ngan mnyam par khungs phyung nas //
K12D0834_H0798:470a-22: ma rtogs le lo snyom las byas //
K12D0834_H0798:470a-23: don ma grub par ngan song 'gro //
K12D0834_H0798:470a-24: sems kyis mnyam par ma rtogs na //
K12D0834_H0798:470a-25: tshig gis mnyam pas sangs mi rgya; ;de bas don tshig ldan par byos //
K12D0834_H0798:470a-27: rnal 'byor don chen rtogs pa yis //
K12D0834_H0798:470a-28: dus mtha' med par de ltar bsgom //
K12D0834_H0798:470a-29: yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam //
K12D0834_H0798:470a-30: spyod yul sangs rgyas nyid du gcig /
K12D0834_H0798:470a-31: rtag tu bsod nams tshogs chen ldan //
K12D0834_H0798:470a-32: bya byed med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis //
K12D0834_H0798:470b-0: des ni byang chub snying po @470b len; ;zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o //
K12D0834_H0798:470b-1: rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las /
K12D0834_H0798:470b-2: dbang po dang yul du 'dus pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun cu rtsa bdun pa'o ////
K12D0834_H0798:470b-3: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gsang pa'i snying po
K12D0834_H0798:470b-4: de kho na nyid nges pa las sngags 'chang rnams
K12D0834_H0798:470b-5: don yod par bya ba'i phyir thams cad phyag rgyar
K12D0834_H0798:470b-6: 'dus shing phyi nang snod bcud thams cad la 'di
K12D0834_H0798:470b-7: ltar brtags shing phyag rgya'i dam tshig bsrung ba dang
K12D0834_H0798:470b-10: phyag rgya bsdus shing spros pa yang 'di yin te //
K12D0834_H0798:470b-11: ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
K12D0834_H0798:470b-12: gsang ba de nyid kho na las //
K12D0834_H0798:470b-14: mnyam pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor ni //
K12D0834_H0798:470b-15: phyogs bcu dus bzhi ma lus ba'i //
K12D0834_H0798:470b-17: ye nas dbyer med de bzhin nyid //
K12D0834_H0798:470b-18: mnyam dang mi mnyam bya ba min //
K12D0834_H0798:470b-19: de bzhin nyid kyi ngang du 'ubs //
K12D0834_H0798:470b-21: brjod pa ma lus thams cad kun //
K12D0834_H0798:470b-22: chos nyid ngang las ma rtogs pa //
K12D0834_H0798:470b-23: log rtog nyon mongs rdul tsam med //
K12D0834_H0798:470b-25: de bzhin nyid las ma g-yos te //
K12D0834_H0798:470b-26: bdag nyid dbyings las mi gzhan phyir //
K12D0834_H0798:470b-27: mnyam la mnyam par gnas pa yi //
K12D0834_H0798:470b-28: rnam gsum tshul gyis bsgoms byas shing //
K12D0834_H0798:470b-29: phyag rgya skyed cing log 'dul ba //
K12D0834_H0798:470b-30: bya byed med pa'i tshul gyis su //
K12D0834_H0798:470b-31: las rnams ma lus rdzogs par byed //
K12D0834_H0798:470b-32: de ltar rtogs shing rigs kyi mchog /
K12D0834_H0798:471a-2: ye nas rang bzhin 'od gsal bas //
K12D0834_H0798:471a-3: byang chub skye 'khrungs rgyu yang yin //
K12D0834_H0798:471a-5: rgyu 'bras dbyer med rdo rje'i sa; ;bcu gsum don grub de gnas pa //
K12D0834_H0798:471a-6: mthar phyin gang la'ang mi gnas pa'o //
K12D0834_H0798:471a-7: rang bzhin phyag rgya chen po ni //
K12D0834_H0798:471a-8: phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kun //
K12D0834_H0798:471a-9: thams cad shes rab ngang du gnas //
K12D0834_H0798:471a-10: rigs lnga bder gshegs yab yum du //
K12D0834_H0798:471a-11: ma bcos ye nas de ltar gnas //
K12D0834_H0798:471a-12: thabs dang shes rab nyid la rol //
K12D0834_H0798:471a-13: bde min ma chags tshogs chen po //
K12D0834_H0798:471a-14: yang dag nyid la rab tu rdzogs //
K12D0834_H0798:471a-15: lhag pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni //
K12D0834_H0798:471a-16: nang gi rtags ni phyir byung ste //
K12D0834_H0798:471a-17: mdor bsdus phyag rgya chen po dang //
K12D0834_H0798:471a-18: gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs pa //
K12D0834_H0798:471a-20: yan lag stabs chen bsgul bsigs kun //
K12D0834_H0798:471a-21: nyid kyi dbyings las ma g-yos kyang //
K12D0834_H0798:471a-22: rang bzhin nyid kyis de ltar gnas //
K12D0834_H0798:471a-23: 'joms shing cis kyang mi tshugs pa; ;rang byung chen po lha yi lha //
K12D0834_H0798:471a-24: thams cad kun la 'bigs par byed //
K12D0834_H0798:471a-25: dpa' bo zhes kyang gdags par bya'o //
K12D0834_H0798:471a-26: las ngang las kyis mi gos pa //
K12D0834_H0798:471a-27: gnyis med dbyings kyi don rtogs shing //
K12D0834_H0798:471a-28: ma chags pa la chags pa dang //
K12D0834_H0798:471a-29: shin tu rnam par dag pa yi //
K12D0834_H0798:471a-30: de bzhin nyid dbyings dkyil 'khor la //
K12D0834_H0798:471a-31: sku gsung thugs ldan zad mi shes //
K12D0834_H0798:471b-0: yon tan mi zang gter @471b du 'gyur //
K12D0834_H0798:471b-1: gzhi ni mi zad par ldan pa'o //
K12D0834_H0798:471b-2: sku gsung las rnams rdzogs byed pa'o //
K12D0834_H0798:471b-3: rnam par rtog med tshul gyis ni //
K12D0834_H0798:471b-4: thams cad kun la chags med rol //
K12D0834_H0798:471b-5: 'dul ba'i don lan bsam mi khyab; ;'joms dang ma chags kun 'byung dang //
K12D0834_H0798:471b-6: thams cad dbang bsdus don 'grub pa //
K12D0834_H0798:471b-7: ma lus kun 'dus rnam par dag /
K12D0834_H0798:471b-9: rigs bzhi ma lus thams cad kun //
K12D0834_H0798:471b-10: mnyam rdzogs dbyings su thams cad 'dus //
K12D0834_H0798:471b-11: rigs rnams gcig med gcig pa ste //
K12D0834_H0798:471b-12: lhun grub dkyil 'khor ngang nyid du //
K12D0834_H0798:471b-13: phyag rgya'i dam tshig mtshan nyid ni //
K12D0834_H0798:471b-14: thugs kyi rtags su bstan pa yin //
K12D0834_H0798:471b-15: dper na rgyal pos rgyas btab na //
K12D0834_H0798:471b-16: sems can kun gyis yong mi 'da'//
K12D0834_H0798:471b-17: de bzhin mnyam nyid phyag rgya yin //
K12D0834_H0798:471b-18: kun la khyab cing thams cad snang //
K12D0834_H0798:471b-19: sku gsung thugs kyi rgyas btab na //
K12D0834_H0798:471b-20: bdud dang mu stegs mang po kun //
K12D0834_H0798:471b-21: mi mthun phyogs kyis dbang byar med //
K12D0834_H0798:471b-22: rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs nges na //
K12D0834_H0798:471b-23: 'di lta bu la rtag tu gnas //
K12D0834_H0798:471b-24: de lta bu yi blo med na //
K12D0834_H0798:471b-25: rdo rje'i rigs su yong mi bshad //
K12D0834_H0798:471b-26: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las /
K12D0834_H0798:471b-27: phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi le'u ste bdun cu brgyad pa'o ////
K12D0834_H0798:471b-28: de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos de
K12D0834_H0798:471b-29: bzhin gshegs pa nyid la gsang sngags kyi rgyal po
K12D0834_H0798:471b-30: brtan par gzung ba 'di ched du brjod do //
K12D0834_H0798:472a-0: kye kye phyogs bcu dus bzhi rang bzhin @472a *//
K12D0834_H0798:472a-1: 'di; ;de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid //
K12D0834_H0798:472a-3: rnam rtog zhags pas so sor zin //
K12D0834_H0798:472a-4: sa rnams khyad par bkod pa yang //
K12D0834_H0798:472a-5: gsang ba'i snying por 'gro ba'i lam //
K12D0834_H0798:472a-6: ye shes ngo mtshar rab 'byams kyis //
K12D0834_H0798:472a-7: don du mi 'gyur yong ma gsungs //
K12D0834_H0798:472a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis //
K12D0834_H0798:472a-9: phyag rgya gsang chen snying po 'di //
K12D0834_H0798:472a-10: rtogs nas smra bar byed pa gang //
K12D0834_H0798:472a-11: de nyid nga yin dbang yang rdzogs //
K12D0834_H0798:472a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la //
K12D0834_H0798:472a-13: gsang ba 'di las gzhan mi mnga'//
K12D0834_H0798:472a-14: sgro dang skur ba zhi ba yi //
K12D0834_H0798:472a-15: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na //
K12D0834_H0798:472a-16: de nyid nges pa'i dbyings las phyung //
K12D0834_H0798:472a-17: de ni nges par lung bstan te //
K12D0834_H0798:472a-18: sras ni thugs las skyes pa yin //
K12D0834_H0798:472a-19: sa rab rig pa 'dzin las gnas //
K12D0834_H0798:472a-20: zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbyer
K12D0834_H0798:472a-21: med par dgyes nas dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid kyi
K12D0834_H0798:472a-22: dbyings sku gsung thugs kyi lhun stug po bkod pa'i
K12D0834_H0798:472a-24: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las //
K12D0834_H0798:472a-25: yongs su gzung ba'i le'u ste bdun cu dgu pa'o ////
K12D0834_H0798:472a-26: 'phags pa'i rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i stong phrag
K12D0834_H0798:472a-27: brgya pa las mtshan nyid dang rgyud thams cad kyi
K12D0834_H0798:472a-28: lung gi spyi // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba //
K12D0834_H0798:472a-29: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i
K12D0834_H0798:472a-30: le'u las thams cad ma lus par spros te 'khor
K12D0834_H0798:472b-0: @472b lo bskor ba de dag gi 'bras bu mchog
K12D0834_H0798:472b-1: / gsang ba chen po 'di yod par //
K12D0834_H0798:472b-2: me mar mur gyi dong 'bogs shing //
K12D0834_H0798:472b-3: spu gri so ni gtams las kyang //
K12D0834_H0798:472b-5: khong na gnas pa'i yang khong na //
K12D0834_H0798:472b-6: lcags kyi sgrom bu kha bsdam mo //
K12D0834_H0798:472b-7: thams cad la yang me long bzhin //
K12D0834_H0798:472b-8: bltas kyang gzugs brnyan mi snang ngo //
K12D0834_H0798:472b-9: ye shes 'phrul gyi lde mig gis //
K12D0834_H0798:472b-10: rdo rje tha ram sgrom phye nas //
K12D0834_H0798:472b-11: yid bzhin rin chen gter phyung ba //
K12D0834_H0798:472b-12: skal ldan mchog gis spyad du gsol //
K12D0834_H0798:472b-13: yi ge kun la mi snang zhing //
K12D0834_H0798:472b-14: bla ma'i thugs la gnas pa ni //
K12D0834_H0798:472b-15: skal ldan mchog gi spyod yul te //
K12D0834_H0798:472b-16: kun dang thun mong de ma yin //
K12D0834_H0798:472b-19: snod gzhan dag tu blugs pa ni //
K12D0834_H0798:472b-20: snod kyang 'chag la 'o ma yang 'bo; ;yong gis gser gyi rang bzhin la //
K12D0834_H0798:472b-21: dbyibs kyi khyad par cir yang snang //
K12D0834_H0798:472b-22: gser las gyur pa rdul tsam med //
K12D0834_H0798:472b-23: de bzhin chos kyi mtshan nyid kyang //
K12D0834_H0798:472b-24: mtshan ma sna tshogs cir snang yang //
K12D0834_H0798:472b-25: nyid las gyur pa rdul tsam med //
K12D0834_H0798:472b-26: gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las //
